Hoare logic.

From Coq Require Import FunctionalExtensionality.
From CDF Require Import Sequences.

Local Open Scope string_scope.
Local Open Scope Z_scope.
Local Open Scope list_scope.

Ltac inv H := inversion H; clear H; subst.

1. The IMP language

1.1. Arithmetic expressions

Definition ident := string.
The abstract syntax: an arithmetic expression is either... 
Inductive aexp : Type :=
  | CONST (n: Z)                       (**r a constant, or *)
  | VAR (x: ident)                     (**r a variable, or *)
  | PLUS (a1: aexp) (a2: aexp)         (**r a sum of two expressions, or *)
  | MINUS (a1: aexp) (a2: aexp).       (**r a difference of two expressions *)
The denotational semantics: an evaluation function that computes the integer value denoted by an expression. This function is parameterized by a store s that associates values to variables. 
Definition store : Type := ident -> Z.

Fixpoint aeval (a: aexp) (s: store) : Z :=
  match a with
  | CONST n => n
  | VAR x => s x
  | PLUS a1 a2 => aeval a1 s + aeval a2 s
  | MINUS a1 a2 => aeval a1 s - aeval a2 s
  end.

1.2. Boolean expressions

The IMP language has conditional statements (if/then/else) and loops. They are controlled by expressions that evaluate to Boolean values. Here is the abstract syntax of Boolean expressions. 
Inductive bexp : Type :=
  | TRUE                              (**r always true *)
  | FALSE                             (**r always false *)
  | EQUAL (a1: aexp) (a2: aexp)       (**r whether [a1 = a2] *)
  | LESSEQUAL (a1: aexp) (a2: aexp)   (**r whether [a1 <= a2] *)
  | NOT (b1: bexp)                    (**r Boolean negation *)
  | AND (b1: bexp) (b2: bexp).        (**r Boolean conjunction *)
Just like arithmetic expressions evaluate to integers, Boolean expressions evaluate to Boolean values true or false. 
Fixpoint beval (b: bexp) (s: store) : bool :=
  match b with
  | TRUE => true
  | FALSE => false
  | EQUAL a1 a2 => aeval a1 s =? aeval a2 s
  | LESSEQUAL a1 a2 => aeval a1 s <=? aeval a2 s
  | NOT b1 => negb (beval b1 s)
  | AND b1 b2 => beval b1 s && beval b2 s
  end.
There are many useful derived forms. 
Definition NOTEQUAL (a1 a2: aexp) : bexp := NOT (EQUAL a1 a2).

Definition GREATEREQUAL (a1 a2: aexp) : bexp := LESSEQUAL a2 a1.

Definition GREATER (a1 a2: aexp) : bexp := NOT (LESSEQUAL a1 a2).

Definition LESS (a1 a2: aexp) : bexp := GREATER a2 a1.

Definition OR (b1 b2: bexp) : bexp := NOT (AND (NOT b1) (NOT b2)).

1.3. Commands

To complete the definition of the IMP language, here is the abstract syntax of commands, also known as statements. 
Inductive com: Type :=
  | SKIP                                     (**r do nothing *)
  | ASSIGN (x: ident) (a: aexp)              (**r assignment: [v := a] *)
  | SEQ (c1: com) (c2: com)                  (**r sequence: [c1; c2] *)
  | IFTHENELSE (b: bexp) (c1: com) (c2: com) (**r conditional: [if b then c1 else c2] *)
  | WHILE (b: bexp) (c1: com)                (**r loop: [while b do c1 done] *)
  | ASSERT (b: bexp)                         (**r assertion (error if false) *)
  | HAVOC (x: ident).                        (**r nondeterministic assignment *)
We can write c1 ;; c2 instead of SEQ c1 c2, it is easier on the eyes. 
Infix ";;" := SEQ (at level 80, right associativity).
Reduction semantics. 
Definition update (x: ident) (v: Z) (s: store) : store :=
  fun y => if string_dec x y then v else s y.


forall (x : ident) (v : Z) (s : store),
update x v s x = v


forall (x : ident) (v : Z) (s : store),
update x v s x = v

  
x: ident
v: Z
s: store
(if string_dec x x then v else s x) = v
 destruct (string_dec x x); congruence.
Qed.


forall (x : ident) (v : Z) (s : store) (y : ident),
x <> y -> update x v s y = s y


forall (x : ident) (v : Z) (s : store) (y : ident),
x <> y -> update x v s y = s y

  
x: ident
v: Z
s: store
y: ident
H: x <> y
(if string_dec x y then v else s y) = s y
 destruct (string_dec x y); congruence.
Qed.
The relation red (c, s) (c', s') , written c / s --> c' / s' in the lectures, defines a basic reduction, that is, the first computation step when executing command c in initial memory state s. s' is the memory state "after" this computation step. c' is a command that represent all the computations that remain to be performed later.
The reduction relation is presented as a Coq inductive predicate, with one case (one "constructor") for each reduction rule. 
Inductive red: com * store -> com * store -> Prop :=
  | red_assign: forall x a s,
      red (ASSIGN x a, s) (SKIP, update x (aeval a s) s)
  | red_seq_done: forall c s,
      red (SEQ SKIP c, s) (c, s)
  | red_seq_step: forall c1 c s1 c2 s2,
      red (c1, s1) (c2, s2) ->
      red (SEQ c1 c, s1) (SEQ c2 c, s2)
  | red_ifthenelse: forall b c1 c2 s,
      red (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2, s) ((if beval b s then c1 else c2), s)
  | red_while_done: forall b c s,
      beval b s = false ->
      red (WHILE b c, s) (SKIP, s)
  | red_while_loop: forall b c s,
      beval b s = true ->
      red (WHILE b c, s) (SEQ c (WHILE b c), s)
  | red_havoc: forall x s n,
      red (HAVOC x, s) (SKIP, update x n s)
  | red_assert: forall b s,
      beval b s = true ->
      red (ASSERT b, s) (SKIP, s).
The predicate error c s means that command c started in state s causes a run-time error. This is written c / s --> err in the lectures. 
Fixpoint error (c: com) (s: store) : Prop :=
  match c with
  | ASSERT b => beval b s = false
  | (c1 ;; c2) => error c1 s
  | _ => False
  end.

Definition terminated (c: com) : Prop :=  c = SKIP.

Definition terminates (c: com) (s s': store) : Prop :=
  exists c', star red (c, s) (c', s') /\ terminated c'.

Definition goeswrong (c: com) (s: store) : Prop :=
  exists c' s', star red (c, s) (c', s') /\ error c' s'.

2. Hoare logic

2.1. Assertions on the values of variables

Hoare logic manipulates formulas / claims / assertions that "talk about" the values of the program variables. A typical assertion is 0 ‚â§ x ‚àß x ‚â§ y, meaning "at this program point, the value of variable x is positive and less than or equal to the value of variable y".
In our Coq development, we represent assertions by Coq logical formulas (type Prop) parameterized by the current store, which provides the values of the variables.
For example, the assertion 0 ‚â§ x ‚àß x ‚â§ y above is represented by the Coq predicate fun s ‚áí 0 ‚â§ s "x" ‚àß s "x" ‚â§ s "y". 
Definition assertion : Type := store -> Prop.
Here are some useful assertions. Conjunction and disjunction of two assertions. 
Definition aand (P Q: assertion) : assertion :=
  fun s => P s /\ Q s.

Definition aor (P Q: assertion) : assertion :=
  fun s => P s \/ Q s.
The assertion "arithmetic expression a evaluates to value v". 
Definition aequal (a: aexp) (v: Z) : assertion :=
  fun s => aeval a s = v.
The assertions "Boolean expression b evaluates to true / to false". 
Definition atrue (b: bexp) : assertion :=
  fun s => beval b s = true.

Definition afalse (b: bexp) : assertion :=
  fun s => beval b s = false.
The assertion written " P[x <- a] " in the literature. Substituting a for x in P amounts to evaluating P in stores where the variable x is equal to the value of expression a. 
Definition aupdate (x: ident) (a: aexp) (P: assertion) : assertion :=
  fun s => P (update x (aeval a s) s).
Pointwise implication. Unlike conjunction and disjunction, this is not a predicate over the store, just a Coq proposition. 
Definition aimp (P Q: assertion) : Prop :=
  forall s, P s -> Q s.
Quantification. 
Definition aexists {A: Type} (P: A -> assertion) : assertion :=
  fun (s: store) => exists (a: A), P a s.

Definition aforall {A: Type} (P: A -> assertion) : assertion :=
  fun (s: store) => forall (a: A), P a s.
A few notations to improve legibility. 
Notation "P -->> Q" := (aimp P Q) (at level 95, no associativity).
Notation "P //\\ Q" := (aand P Q) (at level 80, right associativity).
Notation "P \\// Q" := (aor P Q) (at level 75, right associativity).

2.2. The rules of Hoare logic

Here are the base rules for weak Hoare logic. They define a relation ‚¶ÉP‚¶Ñ c ‚¶ÉQ‚¶Ñ, where
  • P is the precondition, assumed to hold "before" executing c;
  • c is the program or program fragment we reason about;
  • Q is the postcondition, guaranteed to hold "after" executing c.
    This is a "weak" logic, meaning that it does not guarantee termination of the command c. What is guaranteed is that if c terminates, then its final store satisfies postcondition Q. 
Reserved Notation "‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ" (at level 90, c at next level).

Inductive Hoare: assertion -> com -> assertion -> Prop :=
  | Hoare_skip: forall P,
      ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ
  | Hoare_assign: forall P x a,
      ‚¶É aupdate x a P ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ
  | Hoare_seq: forall P Q R c1 c2,
      ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
      ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ ->
      ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1;;c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ
  | Hoare_ifthenelse: forall P Q b c1 c2,
      ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
      ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
      ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
  | Hoare_while: forall P b c,
      ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ ->
      ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ
  | Hoare_havoc: forall x Q,
      ‚¶É aforall (fun n => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
  | Hoare_assert: forall P b,
      ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ
  | Hoare_consequence: forall P Q P' Q' c,
      ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
      P' -->> P ->
      Q -->> Q' ->
      ‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ

where "‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ" := (Hoare P c Q).
Here are the rules for strong Hoare logic, defining strong triples „ÄöP„Äõ c „ÄöQ„Äõ that guarantee that c terminates. The only difference with weak triples is the rule for while loops. 
Reserved Notation "„Äö P „Äõ c „Äö Q „Äõ" (at level 90, c at next level).

Definition alessthan (a: aexp) (v: Z) : assertion :=
  fun s => 0 <= aeval a s < v.

Inductive HOARE: assertion -> com -> assertion -> Prop :=
  | HOARE_skip: forall P,
      „Äö P „Äõ SKIP „Äö P „Äõ
  | HOARE_assign: forall P x a,
      „Äö aupdate x a P „Äõ ASSIGN x a „Äö P „Äõ
  | HOARE_seq: forall P Q R c1 c2,
      „Äö P „Äõ c1 „Äö Q „Äõ ->
      „Äö Q „Äõ c2 „Äö R „Äõ ->
      „Äö P „Äõ c1;;c2 „Äö R „Äõ
  | HOARE_ifthenelse: forall P Q b c1 c2,
      „Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ c1 „Äö Q „Äõ ->
      „Äö afalse b //\\ P „Äõ c2 „Äö Q „Äõ ->
      „Äö P „Äõ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 „Äö Q „Äõ
  | HOARE_while: forall P b c a,
      (forall v, 
         „Äö atrue b //\\ aequal a v //\\ P „Äõ c „Äö alessthan a v //\\ P „Äõ) ->
      „Äö P „Äõ WHILE b c „Äö afalse b //\\ P „Äõ
  | HOARE_havoc: forall x Q,
      „Äö aforall (fun n => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) „Äõ HAVOC x „Äö Q „Äõ
  | HOARE_assert: forall P b,
      „Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ ASSERT b „Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ
  | HOARE_consequence: forall P Q P' Q' c,
      „Äö P „Äõ c „Äö Q „Äõ ->
      P' -->> P ->
      Q -->> Q' ->
      „Äö P' „Äõ c „Äö Q' „Äõ

where "„Äö P „Äõ c „Äö Q „Äõ" := (HOARE P c Q).

2.3. Derived and admissible rules

forall (P P' Q : assertion) (c : com),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ -> P' -->> P -> ‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ


forall (P P' Q : assertion) (c : com),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ -> P' -->> P -> ‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ

  
P, P', Q: assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
 apply Hoare_consequence with (P := P) (Q := Q); unfold aimp; auto.
Qed.


forall (P Q Q' : assertion) (c : com),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ -> Q -->> Q' -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ


forall (P Q Q' : assertion) (c : com),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ -> Q -->> Q' -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ

  
P, Q, Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: Q -->> Q'
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ
 apply Hoare_consequence with (P := P) (Q := Q); unfold aimp; auto.
Qed.


forall (P : assertion) (x : ident) (a : aexp),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a
‚¶É aexists
    (fun x0 : Z =>
     aexists
       (fun v : Z =>
        aequal (VAR x) v //\\
        aupdate x (CONST x0) (P //\\ aequal a v))) ‚¶Ñ


forall (P : assertion) (x : ident) (a : aexp),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a
‚¶É aexists
    (fun x0 : Z =>
     aexists
       (fun v : Z =>
        aequal (VAR x) v //\\
        aupdate x (CONST x0) (P //\\ aequal a v))) ‚¶Ñ

        aequal (VAR x) v //\\
        aupdate x (CONST x0) (P //\\ aequal a v))) ‚¶Ñ

        aupdate x (CONST x0) (P //\\ aequal a v))) ‚¶Ñ

P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
Ps: P s
x0:= s x: Z
v:= aeval a s: Z
s':= update x v s: store
s'':= update x x0 s': store
H: s'' = s
aequal a v s
 red; auto.
Qed.
Some derived constructs, with proof rules. 
forall (b : bexp) (c : com) (P Q : assertion),
‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
afalse b //\\ P -->> Q ->
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ


forall (b : bexp) (c : com) (P Q : assertion),
‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
afalse b //\\ P -->> Q ->
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ

  
b: bexp
c: com
P, Q: assertion
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: afalse b //\\ P -->> Q
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
c: com
P, Q: assertion
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: afalse b //\\ P -->> Q
‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ

  apply Hoare_consequence_pre with Q; auto using Hoare_skip.
Qed.

Definition DOWHILE (c: com) (b: bexp) : com :=
  c ;; WHILE b c.


forall (P : assertion) (b : bexp) (c : com)
  (Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
atrue b //\\ Q -->> P ->
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ DOWHILE c b ‚¶É afalse b //\\ Q ‚¶Ñ


forall (P : assertion) (b : bexp) (c : com)
  (Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
atrue b //\\ Q -->> P ->
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ DOWHILE c b ‚¶É afalse b //\\ Q ‚¶Ñ

  
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
Q: assertion
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: atrue b //\\ Q -->> P
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ DOWHILE c b ‚¶É afalse b //\\ Q ‚¶Ñ
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
Q: assertion
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: atrue b //\\ Q -->> P
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
Q: assertion
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: atrue b //\\ Q -->> P
‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É afalse b //\\ Q ‚¶Ñ
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
Q: assertion
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: atrue b //\\ Q -->> P
‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É afalse b //\\ Q ‚¶Ñ

  
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
Q: assertion
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: atrue b //\\ Q -->> P
‚¶É atrue b //\\ Q ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
 apply Hoare_consequence_pre with P; auto.
Qed.
A frame rule for strong triples. Used to reason about "for" loops below. 
Fixpoint assigns (c: com) (x: ident) : Prop :=
  match c with
  | SKIP => False
  | ASSIGN y a => x = y
  | SEQ c1 c2 => assigns c1 x \/ assigns c2 x
  | IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 => assigns c1 x \/ assigns c2 x
  | WHILE b c => assigns c x
  | ASSERT b => False
  | HAVOC y => x = y
  end.

Definition independent (A: assertion) (vars: ident -> Prop) : Prop :=
  forall (s1 s2: store),
  (forall x, ~ vars x -> s1 x = s2 x) ->
  A s1 -> A s2.

Ltac Tauto :=
  let s := fresh "s" in
  unfold aand, aor, aimp in *;
  intro s;
  repeat (match goal with [ H: (forall (s': store), _) |- _ ] => specialize (H s) end);
  intuition auto.


forall (R P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion),
„Äö P „Äõ c „Äö Q „Äõ ->
independent R (assigns c) ->
„Äö P //\\ R „Äõ c „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ


forall (R P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion),
„Äö P „Äõ c „Äö Q „Äõ ->
independent R (assigns c) ->
„Äö P //\\ R „Äõ c „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ

  
R: assertion
forall (P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion),
„Äö P „Äõ c „Äö Q „Äõ ->
independent R (assigns c) ->
„Äö P //\\ R „Äõ c „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ

  
R: assertion
forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,
independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2
R: assertion
IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,
independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2
forall (P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion),
„Äö P „Äõ c „Äö Q „Äõ ->
independent R (assigns c) ->
„Äö P //\\ R „Äõ c „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ

  
R: assertion
forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,
independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2
 
R: assertion
vars1, vars2: ident -> Prop
H: forall s1 s2 : store,
(forall x : ident, ~ vars1 x -> s1 x = s2 x) ->
R s1 -> R s2
H0: forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x
s1, s2: store
H1: forall x : ident, ~ vars2 x -> s1 x = s2 x
H2: R s1
R s2
 apply H with s1; auto.

IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,
independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2

(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->

c1, c2: com
H: „Äö P „Äõ c1 „Äö Q „Äõ
H0: „Äö Q „Äõ c2 „Äö R0 „Äõ
IHHOARE1: independent R (assigns c1) ->
„Äö P //\\ R „Äõ c1 „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ
IHHOARE2: independent R (assigns c2) ->
„Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ c2 „Äö R0 //\\ R „Äõ
IND: independent R
  (fun x : ident => assigns c1 x \/ assigns c2 x)
„Äö P //\\ R „Äõ c1;; c2 „Äö R0 //\\ R „Äõ

IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,
independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2

b: bexp
c1, c2: com

H0: „Äö afalse b //\\ P „Äõ c2 „Äö Q „Äõ
IHHOARE1: independent R (assigns c1) ->
„Äö (atrue b //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ c1 „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ
IHHOARE2: independent R (assigns c2) ->
„Äö (afalse b //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ c2 „Äö 
Q //\\ R „Äõ

  (fun x : ident => assigns c1 x \/ assigns c2 x)

P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
a: aexp
H: forall v : Z,
„Äö atrue b //\\ aequal a v //\\ P „Äõ c
„Äö alessthan a v //\\ P „Äõ
H0: forall v : Z,
independent R (assigns c) ->
„Äö (atrue b //\\ aequal a v //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ c
„Äö (alessthan a v //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ
IND: independent R (fun x : ident => assigns c x)
„Äö P //\\ R „Äõ WHILE b c „Äö (afalse b //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ

independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2
x: ident
Q: assertion
IND: independent R (fun x0 : ident => x0 = x)
„Äö aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) //\\ R
„Äõ HAVOC x „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ

independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->

„Äö (atrue b //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ 
ASSERT b „Äö (atrue b //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ
R: assertion
IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,
independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: „Äö P „Äõ c „Äö Q „Äõ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHOARE: independent R (assigns c) ->
„Äö P //\\ R „Äõ c „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ
IND: independent R (assigns c)
„Äö P' //\\ R „Äõ c „Äö Q' //\\ R „Äõ

„Äö P //\\ R „Äõ SKIP „Äö P //\\ R „Äõ

P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
IND: independent R (fun x0 : ident => x0 = x)
s: store
A: P (update x (aeval a s) s)
B: R s
forall x0 : ident,
x0 <> x -> s x0 = update x (aeval a s) s x0
R: assertion
IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,
independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
IND: independent R (fun x0 : ident => x0 = x)

R: assertion
IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,
independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
IND: independent R (fun x0 : ident => x0 = x)
s: store
A: P (update x (aeval a s) s)
B: R s
y: ident
DIFF: y <> x
s y = update x (aeval a s) s y
R: assertion
IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,
independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2

  Tauto.

R: assertion
IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,
independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2
P, Q, R0: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: „Äö P „Äõ c1 „Äö Q „Äõ
H0: „Äö Q „Äõ c2 „Äö R0 „Äõ
IHHOARE1: independent R (assigns c1) ->
„Äö P //\\ R „Äõ c1 „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ
IHHOARE2: independent R (assigns c2) ->
„Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ c2 „Äö R0 //\\ R „Äõ
IND: independent R
  (fun x : ident => assigns c1 x \/ assigns c2 x)
„Äö P //\\ R „Äõ c1;; c2 „Äö R0 //\\ R „Äõ

„Äö P //\\ R „Äõ c1 „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ

  (fun x : ident => assigns c1 x \/ assigns c2 x)
forall x : ident,
assigns c1 x ->
(fun x0 : ident => assigns c1 x0 \/ assigns c2 x0) x

R: assertion
IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,
independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2
P, Q, R0: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: „Äö P „Äõ c1 „Äö Q „Äõ
H0: „Äö Q „Äõ c2 „Äö R0 „Äõ
IHHOARE1: independent R (assigns c1) ->
„Äö P //\\ R „Äõ c1 „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ

„Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ c2 „Äö R0 //\\ R „Äõ

  (fun x : ident => assigns c1 x \/ assigns c2 x)

assigns c2 x ->
(fun x0 : ident => assigns c1 x0 \/ assigns c2 x0) x
 cbn; intros; tauto.

R: assertion
IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,
independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: „Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ c1 „Äö Q „Äõ
H0: „Äö afalse b //\\ P „Äõ c2 „Äö Q „Äõ
IHHOARE1: independent R (assigns c1) ->
„Äö (atrue b //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ c1 „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ
IHHOARE2: independent R (assigns c2) ->
„Äö (afalse b //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ c2 „Äö 
Q //\\ R „Äõ
IND: independent R
  (fun x : ident => assigns c1 x \/ assigns c2 x)
„Äö P //\\ R „Äõ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ
 
R: assertion
IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,
independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: „Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ c1 „Äö Q „Äõ
H0: „Äö afalse b //\\ P „Äõ c2 „Äö Q „Äõ
IHHOARE1: independent R (assigns c1) ->
„Äö (atrue b //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ c1 „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ
IHHOARE2: independent R (assigns c2) ->
„Äö (afalse b //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ c2 „Äö 
Q //\\ R „Äõ
IND: independent R
  (fun x : ident => assigns c1 x \/ assigns c2 x)
„Äö atrue b //\\ P //\\ R „Äõ c1 „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ

IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,

independent R vars2

  (fun x : ident => assigns c1 x \/ assigns c2 x)

IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,

  (fun x : ident => assigns c1 x \/ assigns c2 x)
„Äö ?P „Äõ c1 „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ

IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,

(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2

„Äö (atrue b //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ c1 „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ
IHHOARE2: independent R (assigns c2) ->
„Äö (afalse b //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ c2 „Äö 
Q //\\ R „Äõ
IND: independent R
  (fun x : ident => assigns c1 x \/ assigns c2 x)
Q //\\ R -->> Q //\\ R
 
R: assertion
IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,
independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: „Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ c1 „Äö Q „Äõ
H0: „Äö afalse b //\\ P „Äõ c2 „Äö Q „Äõ
IHHOARE1: independent R (assigns c1) ->
„Äö (atrue b //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ c1 „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ
IHHOARE2: independent R (assigns c2) ->
„Äö (afalse b //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ c2 „Äö 
Q //\\ R „Äõ
IND: independent R
  (fun x : ident => assigns c1 x \/ assigns c2 x)
afalse b //\\ P //\\ R -->> (afalse b //\\ P) //\\ R
R: assertion
IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,
independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: „Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ c1 „Äö Q „Äõ
H0: „Äö afalse b //\\ P „Äõ c2 „Äö Q „Äõ
IHHOARE1: independent R (assigns c1) ->
„Äö (atrue b //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ c1 „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ
IHHOARE2: independent R (assigns c2) ->
„Äö (afalse b //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ c2 „Äö 
Q //\\ R „Äõ
IND: independent R
  (fun x : ident => assigns c1 x \/ assigns c2 x)
Q //\\ R -->> Q //\\ R

  
R: assertion
IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,
independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: „Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ c1 „Äö Q „Äõ
H0: „Äö afalse b //\\ P „Äõ c2 „Äö Q „Äõ
IHHOARE1: independent R (assigns c1) ->
„Äö (atrue b //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ c1 „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ
IHHOARE2: independent R (assigns c2) ->
„Äö (afalse b //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ c2 „Äö 
Q //\\ R „Äõ
IND: independent R
  (fun x : ident => assigns c1 x \/ assigns c2 x)
Q //\\ R -->> Q //\\ R
 Tauto.

R: assertion
IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,
independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
a: aexp
H: forall v : Z,
„Äö atrue b //\\ aequal a v //\\ P „Äõ c
„Äö alessthan a v //\\ P „Äõ
H0: forall v : Z,
independent R (assigns c) ->
„Äö (atrue b //\\ aequal a v //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ c
„Äö (alessthan a v //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ
IND: independent R (fun x : ident => assigns c x)
„Äö P //\\ R „Äõ WHILE b c „Äö (afalse b //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ

(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2

„Äö (alessthan a v //\\ P) //\\ R „Äõ

„Äö P //\\ R „Äõ WHILE b c „Äö ?Q „Äõ

afalse b //\\ P //\\ R -->> (afalse b //\\ P) //\\ R
 Tauto.

R: assertion
IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,
independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2
x: ident
Q: assertion
IND: independent R (fun x0 : ident => x0 = x)
„Äö aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) //\\ R
„Äõ HAVOC x „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ
 
R: assertion
IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,
independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2
x: ident
Q: assertion
IND: independent R (fun x0 : ident => x0 = x)
„Äö ?P „Äõ HAVOC x „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ
R: assertion
IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,
independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2
x: ident
Q: assertion
IND: independent R (fun x0 : ident => x0 = x)
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) //\\ R -->>
?P

(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2

 Tauto.

R: assertion
IND_SUB: forall vars1 vars2 : ident -> Prop,
independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: „Äö P „Äõ c „Äö Q „Äõ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHOARE: independent R (assigns c) ->
„Äö P //\\ R „Äõ c „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ
IND: independent R (assigns c)
„Äö P' //\\ R „Äõ c „Äö Q' //\\ R „Äõ

independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2

H1: Q -->> Q'

„Äö P //\\ R „Äõ c „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ
IND: independent R (assigns c)
„Äö ?P „Äõ c „Äö ?Q „Äõ

independent R vars1 ->
(forall x : ident, vars2 x -> vars1 x) ->
independent R vars2

c: com

H1: Q -->> Q'

„Äö P //\\ R „Äõ c „Äö Q //\\ R „Äõ

Q //\\ R -->> Q' //\\ R

  intros s [A B]; split; auto.
Qed.
A counted "for" loop. 
Definition FOR (i: ident) (l: aexp) (h: ident) (c: com) : com :=
  ASSIGN i l;;
  WHILE (LESSEQUAL (VAR i) (VAR h)) (c ;; ASSIGN i (PLUS (VAR i) (CONST 1))).


forall (l : aexp) (h i : ident) (c : com)
  (P : assertion),
„Äö atrue (LESSEQUAL (VAR i) (VAR h)) //\\ P „Äõ c
„Äö aupdate i (PLUS (VAR i) (CONST 1)) P „Äõ ->
~ assigns c i ->
~ assigns c h ->
i <> h ->
„Äö aupdate i l P „Äõ FOR i l h c
„Äö afalse (LESSEQUAL (VAR i) (VAR h)) //\\ P „Äõ


forall (l : aexp) (h i : ident) (c : com)
  (P : assertion),
„Äö atrue (LESSEQUAL (VAR i) (VAR h)) //\\ P „Äõ c
„Äö aupdate i (PLUS (VAR i) (CONST 1)) P „Äõ ->
~ assigns c i ->
~ assigns c h ->
i <> h ->
„Äö aupdate i l P „Äõ FOR i l h c
„Äö afalse (LESSEQUAL (VAR i) (VAR h)) //\\ P „Äõ

H1: ~ assigns c h
H2: i <> h

„Äö afalse (LESSEQUAL (VAR i) (VAR h)) //\\ P „Äõ

c: com
P: assertion
H: „Äö atrue (LESSEQUAL (VAR i) (VAR h)) //\\ P „Äõ c
„Äö aupdate i (PLUS (VAR i) (CONST 1)) P „Äõ
H0: ~ assigns c i
H1: ~ assigns c h
H2: i <> h
variant:= PLUS (MINUS (VAR h) (VAR i)) (CONST 1): aexp
v: Z
aupdate i (PLUS (VAR i) (CONST 1)) P //\\
aequal variant v //\\
atrue (LESSEQUAL (VAR i) (VAR h)) -->> 
?Q
l: aexp
h, i: ident
c: com
P: assertion
H: „Äö atrue (LESSEQUAL (VAR i) (VAR h)) //\\ P „Äõ c
„Äö aupdate i (PLUS (VAR i) (CONST 1)) P „Äõ
H0: ~ assigns c i
H1: ~ assigns c h
H2: i <> h
variant:= PLUS (MINUS (VAR h) (VAR i)) (CONST 1): aexp
v: Z
„Äö ?Q „Äõ ASSIGN i (PLUS (VAR i) (CONST 1))
„Äö alessthan variant v //\\ P „Äõ
 
l: aexp
h, i: ident
c: com
P: assertion
H: „Äö atrue (LESSEQUAL (VAR i) (VAR h)) //\\ P „Äõ c
„Äö aupdate i (PLUS (VAR i) (CONST 1)) P „Äõ
H0: ~ assigns c i
H1: ~ assigns c h
H2: i <> h
variant:= PLUS (MINUS (VAR h) (VAR i)) (CONST 1): aexp
v: Z
s1, s2: store
E: forall x : ident, ~ assigns c x -> s1 x = s2 x
s1 h - s1 i + 1 = v /\ (s1 i <=? s1 h) = true ->
s2 h - s2 i + 1 = v /\ (s2 i <=? s2 h) = true

H1: ~ assigns c h
H2: i <> h
variant:= PLUS (MINUS (VAR h) (VAR i)) (CONST 1): aexp
v: Z
alessthan variant v //\\ P -->>
alessthan variant v //\\ P

  
l: aexp
h, i: ident
c: com
P: assertion
H: „Äö atrue (LESSEQUAL (VAR i) (VAR h)) //\\ P „Äõ c
„Äö aupdate i (PLUS (VAR i) (CONST 1)) P „Äõ
H0: ~ assigns c i
H1: ~ assigns c h
H2: i <> h
variant:= PLUS (MINUS (VAR h) (VAR i)) (CONST 1): aexp
v: Z
alessthan variant v //\\ P -->>
alessthan variant v //\\ P

  Tauto.
Qed.
Some inversion lemmas. 
forall P Q : assertion, ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ -> P -->> Q


forall P Q : assertion, ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ -> P -->> Q

  
P: assertion
P -->> P
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: SKIP = SKIP -> P -->> Q
P' -->> Q'


P: assertion
P -->> P
 red; auto.

P, Q, P', Q': assertion
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: SKIP = SKIP -> P -->> Q
P' -->> Q'
 
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: SKIP = SKIP -> P -->> Q
s: store
H2: P' s
Q' s
 apply H1, IHHoare, H0; auto.
Qed.


forall (x : ident) (a : aexp) (P Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ -> P -->> aupdate x a Q


forall (x : ident) (a : aexp) (P Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ -> P -->> aupdate x a Q

  
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
aupdate x a P -->> aupdate x a P
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall (x0 : ident) (a0 : aexp),
ASSIGN x a = ASSIGN x0 a0 ->
P -->> aupdate x0 a0 Q
P' -->> aupdate x a Q'


P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
aupdate x a P -->> aupdate x a P
 red; auto.

P, Q, P', Q': assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall (x0 : ident) (a0 : aexp),
ASSIGN x a = ASSIGN x0 a0 ->
P -->> aupdate x0 a0 Q
P' -->> aupdate x a Q'
 
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall (x0 : ident) (a0 : aexp),
ASSIGN x a = ASSIGN x0 a0 ->
P -->> aupdate x0 a0 Q
s: store
H2: P' s
Q' (update x (aeval a s) s)
 apply H1, IHHoare, H0; auto.
Qed.


forall (c1 c2 : com) (P Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
exists R : assertion,
  (‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ (‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ)


forall (c1 c2 : com) (P Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
exists R : assertion,
  (‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ (‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ)

  
P, Q, R: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall c2 c3 : com,
c1 = (c2;; c3) ->
exists R : assertion,
  (‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ (‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ)
IHHoare2: forall c1 c3 : com,
c2 = (c1;; c3) ->
exists R0 : assertion,
  (‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R0 ‚¶Ñ) /\ (‚¶É R0 ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ)
exists R0 : assertion,
  (‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R0 ‚¶Ñ) /\ (‚¶É R0 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ)
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall c3 c4 : com,
(c1;; c2) = (c3;; c4) ->
exists R : assertion,
  (‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ (‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c4 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ)
exists R : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ (‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ)


P, Q, R: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall c2 c3 : com,
c1 = (c2;; c3) ->
exists R : assertion,
  (‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ (‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ)
IHHoare2: forall c1 c3 : com,
c2 = (c1;; c3) ->
exists R0 : assertion,
  (‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R0 ‚¶Ñ) /\ (‚¶É R0 ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ)
exists R0 : assertion,
  (‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R0 ‚¶Ñ) /\ (‚¶É R0 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ)
 exists Q; auto.

P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall c3 c4 : com,
(c1;; c2) = (c3;; c4) ->
exists R : assertion,
  (‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ (‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c4 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ)
exists R : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ (‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ)
 
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall c3 c4 : com,
(c1;; c2) = (c3;; c4) ->
exists R : assertion,
  (‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ (‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c4 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ)
R: assertion
C1: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ
C2: ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
exists R : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ (‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ)

  exists R; split; eauto using Hoare_consequence_pre, Hoare_consequence_post.
Qed.


forall (b : bexp) (c1 c2 : com) (P Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
(‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ)


forall (b : bexp) (c1 c2 : com) (P Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
(‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ)

  
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall (b0 : bexp) (c2 c3 : com),
c1 = IFTHENELSE b0 c2 c3 ->
(‚¶É atrue b0 //\\ atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b0 //\\ atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ)
IHHoare2: forall (b0 : bexp) (c1 c3 : com),
c2 = IFTHENELSE b0 c1 c3 ->
(‚¶É atrue b0 //\\ afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b0 //\\ afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É Q
 ‚¶Ñ)
(‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ)
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall (b0 : bexp) (c3 c4 : com),
IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 = IFTHENELSE b0 c3 c4 ->
(‚¶É atrue b0 //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b0 //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c4 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ)
(‚¶É atrue b //\\ P' ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b //\\ P' ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ)


P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall (b0 : bexp) (c2 c3 : com),
c1 = IFTHENELSE b0 c2 c3 ->
(‚¶É atrue b0 //\\ atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b0 //\\ atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ)
IHHoare2: forall (b0 : bexp) (c1 c3 : com),
c2 = IFTHENELSE b0 c1 c3 ->
(‚¶É atrue b0 //\\ afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b0 //\\ afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É Q
 ‚¶Ñ)
(‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ)
 split; auto.

P, Q, P', Q': assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall (b0 : bexp) (c3 c4 : com),
IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 = IFTHENELSE b0 c3 c4 ->
(‚¶É atrue b0 //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b0 //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c4 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ)
(‚¶É atrue b //\\ P' ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b //\\ P' ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ)
 
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall (b0 : bexp) (c3 c4 : com),
IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 = IFTHENELSE b0 c3 c4 ->
(‚¶É atrue b0 //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b0 //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c4 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ)
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
C2: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
(‚¶É atrue b //\\ P' ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b //\\ P' ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ)

  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall (b0 : bexp) (c3 c4 : com),
IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 = IFTHENELSE b0 c3 c4 ->
(‚¶É atrue b0 //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b0 //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c4 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ)
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
C2: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
atrue b //\\ P' -->> atrue b //\\ P
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall (b0 : bexp) (c3 c4 : com),
IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 = IFTHENELSE b0 c3 c4 ->
(‚¶É atrue b0 //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b0 //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c4 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ)
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
C2: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
afalse b //\\ P' -->> afalse b //\\ P

  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall (b0 : bexp) (c3 c4 : com),
IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 = IFTHENELSE b0 c3 c4 ->
(‚¶É atrue b0 //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b0 //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c4 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ)
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
C2: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
afalse b //\\ P' -->> afalse b //\\ P

  intros s [A B]; split; auto.
Qed.


forall (b : bexp) (c : com) (P Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
exists Inv : assertion,
  (‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
  (P -->> Inv) /\ (afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q)


forall (b : bexp) (c : com) (P Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
exists Inv : assertion,
  (‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
  (P -->> Inv) /\ (afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q)

  
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare: forall (b0 : bexp) (c0 : com),
c = WHILE b0 c0 ->
exists Inv : assertion,
  (‚¶É atrue b0 //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c0 ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
  (atrue b //\\ P -->> Inv) /\
  (afalse b0 //\\ Inv -->> P)
exists Inv : assertion,
  (‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
  (P -->> Inv) /\
  (afalse b //\\ Inv -->> afalse b //\\ P)
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
b: bexp
c: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall (b0 : bexp) (c0 : com),
WHILE b c = WHILE b0 c0 ->
exists Inv : assertion,
  (‚¶É atrue b0 //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c0 ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
  (P -->> Inv) /\
  (afalse b0 //\\ Inv -->> Q)
exists Inv : assertion,
  (‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
  (P' -->> Inv) /\ (afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q')


P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare: forall (b0 : bexp) (c0 : com),
c = WHILE b0 c0 ->
exists Inv : assertion,
  (‚¶É atrue b0 //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c0 ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
  (atrue b //\\ P -->> Inv) /\
  (afalse b0 //\\ Inv -->> P)
exists Inv : assertion,
  (‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
  (P -->> Inv) /\
  (afalse b //\\ Inv -->> afalse b //\\ P)
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare: forall (b0 : bexp) (c0 : com),
c = WHILE b0 c0 ->
exists Inv : assertion,
  (‚¶É atrue b0 //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c0 ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
  (atrue b //\\ P -->> Inv) /\
  (afalse b0 //\\ Inv -->> P)
(P -->> P) /\ (afalse b //\\ P -->> afalse b //\\ P)
 split; Tauto.

P, Q, P', Q': assertion
b: bexp
c: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall (b0 : bexp) (c0 : com),
WHILE b c = WHILE b0 c0 ->
exists Inv : assertion,
  (‚¶É atrue b0 //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c0 ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
  (P -->> Inv) /\
  (afalse b0 //\\ Inv -->> Q)
exists Inv : assertion,
  (‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
  (P' -->> Inv) /\ (afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q')
 
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
b: bexp
c: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall (b0 : bexp) (c0 : com),
WHILE b c = WHILE b0 c0 ->
exists Inv : assertion,
  (‚¶É atrue b0 //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c0 ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
  (P -->> Inv) /\
  (afalse b0 //\\ Inv -->> Q)
Inv: assertion
C: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ
X: P -->> Inv
Y: afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q
exists Inv : assertion,
  (‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
  (P' -->> Inv) /\ (afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q')

  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
b: bexp
c: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall (b0 : bexp) (c0 : com),
WHILE b c = WHILE b0 c0 ->
exists Inv : assertion,
  (‚¶É atrue b0 //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c0 ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
  (P -->> Inv) /\
  (afalse b0 //\\ Inv -->> Q)
Inv: assertion
C: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ
X: P -->> Inv
Y: afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q
(P' -->> Inv) /\ (afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q')
 split; Tauto.
Qed.


forall (x : ident) (P Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
P -->> aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q)


forall (x : ident) (P Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
P -->> aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q)

  
x: ident
Q: assertion
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q)
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
x: ident
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall x0 : ident,
HAVOC x = HAVOC x0 ->
P -->>
aforall
  (fun n : Z => aupdate x0 (CONST n) Q)
P' -->> aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q')


x: ident
Q: assertion
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q)
 red; auto.

P, Q, P', Q': assertion
x: ident
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall x0 : ident,
HAVOC x = HAVOC x0 ->
P -->>
aforall
  (fun n : Z => aupdate x0 (CONST n) Q)
P' -->> aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q')
 
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
x: ident
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall x0 : ident,
HAVOC x = HAVOC x0 ->
P -->>
aforall
  (fun n : Z => aupdate x0 (CONST n) Q)
s: store
Ps: P' s
n: Z
aupdate x (CONST n) Q' s
 
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
x: ident
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall x0 : ident,
HAVOC x = HAVOC x0 ->
P -->>
aforall
  (fun n : Z => aupdate x0 (CONST n) Q)
s: store
Ps: P' s
n: Z
Q (update x (aeval (CONST n) s) s)
 apply IHHoare; auto. 
Qed.


forall (b : bexp) (P Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
exists R : assertion,
  (P -->> atrue b //\\ R) /\ (atrue b //\\ R -->> Q)


forall (b : bexp) (P Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
exists R : assertion,
  (P -->> atrue b //\\ R) /\ (atrue b //\\ R -->> Q)

  
P: assertion
b: bexp
exists R : assertion,
  (atrue b //\\ P -->> atrue b //\\ R) /\
  (atrue b //\\ R -->> atrue b //\\ P)
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
b: bexp
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall b0 : bexp,
ASSERT b = ASSERT b0 ->
exists R : assertion,
  (P -->> atrue b0 //\\ R) /\
  (atrue b0 //\\ R -->> Q)
exists R : assertion,
  (P' -->> atrue b //\\ R) /\ (atrue b //\\ R -->> Q')


P: assertion
b: bexp
exists R : assertion,
  (atrue b //\\ P -->> atrue b //\\ R) /\
  (atrue b //\\ R -->> atrue b //\\ P)
 exists P; split; Tauto.

P, Q, P', Q': assertion
b: bexp
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall b0 : bexp,
ASSERT b = ASSERT b0 ->
exists R : assertion,
  (P -->> atrue b0 //\\ R) /\
  (atrue b0 //\\ R -->> Q)
exists R : assertion,
  (P' -->> atrue b //\\ R) /\ (atrue b //\\ R -->> Q')
 
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
b: bexp
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall b0 : bexp,
ASSERT b = ASSERT b0 ->
exists R : assertion,
  (P -->> atrue b0 //\\ R) /\
  (atrue b0 //\\ R -->> Q)
R: assertion
A: P -->> atrue b //\\ R
B: atrue b //\\ R -->> Q
exists R : assertion,
  (P' -->> atrue b //\\ R) /\ (atrue b //\\ R -->> Q')

  exists R; split; Tauto.
Qed.
Some admissible rules. 
forall (c : com) (P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion),
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ


forall (c : com) (P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion),
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
x: ident
a: aexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
x: ident
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ


P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->> Q1
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->> Q1
H0: P2 -->> Q2
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->> Q1
H0: P2 -->> Q2
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É ?Q ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->> Q1
H0: P2 -->> Q2
?Q -->> Q1 //\\ Q2
 
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->> Q1
H0: P2 -->> Q2
P1 //\\ P2 -->> Q1 //\\ Q2
 Tauto.

x: ident
a: aexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
x: ident
a: aexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->> aupdate x a Q1
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
x: ident
a: aexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->> aupdate x a Q1
H0: P2 -->> aupdate x a Q2
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
x: ident
a: aexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->> aupdate x a Q1
H0: P2 -->> aupdate x a Q2
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
x: ident
a: aexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->> aupdate x a Q1
H0: P2 -->> aupdate x a Q2
P1 //\\ P2 -->> ?P
 
x: ident
a: aexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->> aupdate x a Q1
H0: P2 -->> aupdate x a Q2
P1 //\\ P2 -->> aupdate x a (Q1 //\\ Q2)
 unfold aupdate in *; Tauto. 

c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: exists R : assertion,
  (‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ (‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ)
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
C11: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É R1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
C11: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É R1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: exists R : assertion,
  (‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ (‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ)
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
C11: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É R1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
R2: assertion
C12: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É R2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  apply Hoare_seq with (R1 //\\ R2); auto.

b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: (‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ)
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: (‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ)
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
atrue b //\\ P1 //\\ P2 -->> ?P
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
atrue b //\\ P1 //\\ P2 -->>
(atrue b //\\ P1) //\\ atrue b //\\ P2
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
afalse b //\\ P1 //\\ P2 -->> ?P
 
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
afalse b //\\ P1 //\\ P2 -->>
(afalse b //\\ P1) //\\ afalse b //\\ P2
 Tauto.

b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: exists Inv : assertion,
  (‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
  (P1 -->> Inv) /\ (afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q1)
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
H0: exists Inv : assertion,
  (‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
  (P2 -->> Inv) /\ (afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q2)
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
‚¶É Inv1 //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É ?Q ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
P1 //\\ P2 -->> Inv1 //\\ Inv2
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
?Q -->> Q1 //\\ Q2

  
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ

c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->

‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2

‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

afalse b //\\ Inv1 //\\ Inv2 -->> Q1 //\\ Q2

c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion

B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ

c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,

‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

Inv2: assertion

A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
atrue b //\\ Inv1 //\\ Inv2 -->> ?P
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,

‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,

‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

afalse b //\\ Inv1 //\\ Inv2 -->> Q1 //\\ Q2
 
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
atrue b //\\ Inv1 //\\ Inv2 -->>
(atrue b //\\ Inv1) //\\ atrue b //\\ Inv2
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->

‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
P1 //\\ P2 -->> Inv1 //\\ Inv2
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->

‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

A1: P1 -->> Inv1

b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
