A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
afalse b //\\ Inv1 //\\ Inv2 -->> Q1 //\\ Q2

  
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
afalse b //\\ Inv1 //\\ Inv2 -->> Q1 //\\ Q2
 Tauto.

b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: exists R : assertion,
  (P1 -->> atrue b //\\ R) /\
  (atrue b //\\ R -->> Q1)
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
A1: P1 -->> atrue b //\\ R1
B1: atrue b //\\ R1 -->> Q1
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
A1: P1 -->> atrue b //\\ R1
B1: atrue b //\\ R1 -->> Q1
H0: exists R : assertion,
  (P2 -->> atrue b //\\ R) /\
  (atrue b //\\ R -->> Q2)
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
A1: P1 -->> atrue b //\\ R1
B1: atrue b //\\ R1 -->> Q1
R2: assertion
A2: P2 -->> atrue b //\\ R2
B2: atrue b //\\ R2 -->> Q2
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
A1: P1 -->> atrue b //\\ R1
B1: atrue b //\\ R1 -->> Q1
R2: assertion
A2: P2 -->> atrue b //\\ R2
B2: atrue b //\\ R2 -->> Q2
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É ?Q ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
A1: P1 -->> atrue b //\\ R1
B1: atrue b //\\ R1 -->> Q1
R2: assertion
A2: P2 -->> atrue b //\\ R2
B2: atrue b //\\ R2 -->> Q2
P1 //\\ P2 -->> ?P
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
A1: P1 -->> atrue b //\\ R1
B1: atrue b //\\ R1 -->> Q1
R2: assertion
A2: P2 -->> atrue b //\\ R2
B2: atrue b //\\ R2 -->> Q2
?Q -->> Q1 //\\ Q2
 
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
A1: P1 -->> atrue b //\\ R1
B1: atrue b //\\ R1 -->> Q1
R2: assertion
A2: P2 -->> atrue b //\\ R2
B2: atrue b //\\ R2 -->> Q2
P1 //\\ P2 -->> atrue b //\\ R1 //\\ R2
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
A1: P1 -->> atrue b //\\ R1
B1: atrue b //\\ R1 -->> Q1
R2: assertion
A2: P2 -->> atrue b //\\ R2
B2: atrue b //\\ R2 -->> Q2
atrue b //\\ R1 //\\ R2 -->> Q1 //\\ Q2

  
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
A1: P1 -->> atrue b //\\ R1
B1: atrue b //\\ R1 -->> Q1
R2: assertion
A2: P2 -->> atrue b //\\ R2
B2: atrue b //\\ R2 -->> Q2
atrue b //\\ R1 //\\ R2 -->> Q1 //\\ Q2
 Tauto.

x: ident
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
x: ident
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q1)
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
x: ident
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q1)
H0: P2 -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q2)
‚¶É P1 //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
x: ident
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q1)
H0: P2 -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q2)
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q1 //\\ Q2 ‚¶Ñ
x: ident
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q1)
H0: P2 -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q2)
P1 //\\ P2 -->> ?P
 
x: ident
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q1)
H0: P2 -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q2)
P1 //\\ P2 -->>
aforall
  (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) (Q1 //\\ Q2))

  unfold aupdate, aforall in *; Tauto. 
Qed.


forall (c : com) (P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion),
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ


forall (c : com) (P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion),
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
x: ident
a: aexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
x: ident
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ


P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->> Q1
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->> Q1
H0: P2 -->> Q2
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->> Q1
H0: P2 -->> Q2
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É ?Q ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->> Q1
H0: P2 -->> Q2
?Q -->> Q1 \\// Q2
 
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->> Q1
H0: P2 -->> Q2
P1 \\// P2 -->> Q1 \\// Q2
 Tauto.

x: ident
a: aexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
x: ident
a: aexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->> aupdate x a Q1
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
x: ident
a: aexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->> aupdate x a Q1
H0: P2 -->> aupdate x a Q2
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
x: ident
a: aexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->> aupdate x a Q1
H0: P2 -->> aupdate x a Q2
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
x: ident
a: aexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->> aupdate x a Q1
H0: P2 -->> aupdate x a Q2
P1 \\// P2 -->> ?P
 
x: ident
a: aexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->> aupdate x a Q1
H0: P2 -->> aupdate x a Q2
P1 \\// P2 -->> aupdate x a (Q1 \\// Q2)
 unfold aupdate in *; Tauto. 

c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: exists R : assertion,
  (‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ (‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ)
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
C11: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É R1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
C11: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É R1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: exists R : assertion,
  (‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ (‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ)
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
C11: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É R1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
R2: assertion
C12: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É R2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  apply Hoare_seq with (R1 \\// R2); auto.

b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: (‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ)
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: (‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ)
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
atrue b //\\ P1 \\// P2 -->> ?P
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
atrue b //\\ P1 \\// P2 -->>
(atrue b //\\ P1) \\// (atrue b //\\ P2)
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
afalse b //\\ P1 \\// P2 -->> ?P
 
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
C11: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C21: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P1 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
C12: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
C22: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P2 ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
afalse b //\\ P1 \\// P2 -->>
(afalse b //\\ P1) \\// (afalse b //\\ P2)
 Tauto.

b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: exists Inv : assertion,
  (‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
  (P1 -->> Inv) /\ (afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q1)
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
H0: exists Inv : assertion,
  (‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
  (P2 -->> Inv) /\ (afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q2)
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
‚¶É Inv1 \\// Inv2 ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É ?Q ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
P1 \\// P2 -->> Inv1 \\// Inv2
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
?Q -->> Q1 \\// Q2

  
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 \\// Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 \\// Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
P1 \\// P2 -->> Inv1 \\// Inv2
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
afalse b //\\ Inv1 \\// Inv2 -->> Q1 \\// Q2

  
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 \\// Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
atrue b //\\ Inv1 \\// Inv2 -->> ?P
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
P1 \\// P2 -->> Inv1 \\// Inv2
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
afalse b //\\ Inv1 \\// Inv2 -->> Q1 \\// Q2
 
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
atrue b //\\ Inv1 \\// Inv2 -->>
(atrue b //\\ Inv1) \\// (atrue b //\\ Inv2)
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
P1 \\// P2 -->> Inv1 \\// Inv2
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
afalse b //\\ Inv1 \\// Inv2 -->> Q1 \\// Q2
 
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
P1 \\// P2 -->> Inv1 \\// Inv2
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
afalse b //\\ Inv1 \\// Inv2 -->> Q1 \\// Q2

  
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P1 P2 Q1 Q2 : assertion,
‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, Inv1: assertion
C1: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv1 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv1 ‚¶Ñ
A1: P1 -->> Inv1
B1: afalse b //\\ Inv1 -->> Q1
Inv2: assertion
C2: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv2 ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv2 ‚¶Ñ
A2: P2 -->> Inv2
B2: afalse b //\\ Inv2 -->> Q2
afalse b //\\ Inv1 \\// Inv2 -->> Q1 \\// Q2
 Tauto.

b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: exists R : assertion,
  (P1 -->> atrue b //\\ R) /\
  (atrue b //\\ R -->> Q1)
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
A1: P1 -->> atrue b //\\ R1
B1: atrue b //\\ R1 -->> Q1
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
A1: P1 -->> atrue b //\\ R1
B1: atrue b //\\ R1 -->> Q1
H0: exists R : assertion,
  (P2 -->> atrue b //\\ R) /\
  (atrue b //\\ R -->> Q2)
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
A1: P1 -->> atrue b //\\ R1
B1: atrue b //\\ R1 -->> Q1
R2: assertion
A2: P2 -->> atrue b //\\ R2
B2: atrue b //\\ R2 -->> Q2
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
A1: P1 -->> atrue b //\\ R1
B1: atrue b //\\ R1 -->> Q1
R2: assertion
A2: P2 -->> atrue b //\\ R2
B2: atrue b //\\ R2 -->> Q2
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É ?Q ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
A1: P1 -->> atrue b //\\ R1
B1: atrue b //\\ R1 -->> Q1
R2: assertion
A2: P2 -->> atrue b //\\ R2
B2: atrue b //\\ R2 -->> Q2
P1 \\// P2 -->> ?P
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
A1: P1 -->> atrue b //\\ R1
B1: atrue b //\\ R1 -->> Q1
R2: assertion
A2: P2 -->> atrue b //\\ R2
B2: atrue b //\\ R2 -->> Q2
?Q -->> Q1 \\// Q2
 
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
A1: P1 -->> atrue b //\\ R1
B1: atrue b //\\ R1 -->> Q1
R2: assertion
A2: P2 -->> atrue b //\\ R2
B2: atrue b //\\ R2 -->> Q2
P1 \\// P2 -->> atrue b //\\ R1 \\// R2
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
A1: P1 -->> atrue b //\\ R1
B1: atrue b //\\ R1 -->> Q1
R2: assertion
A2: P2 -->> atrue b //\\ R2
B2: atrue b //\\ R2 -->> Q2
atrue b //\\ R1 \\// R2 -->> Q1 \\// Q2

  
b: bexp
P1, P2, Q1, Q2, R1: assertion
A1: P1 -->> atrue b //\\ R1
B1: atrue b //\\ R1 -->> Q1
R2: assertion
A2: P2 -->> atrue b //\\ R2
B2: atrue b //\\ R2 -->> Q2
atrue b //\\ R1 \\// R2 -->> Q1 \\// Q2
 Tauto.

x: ident
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: ‚¶É P1 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q1 ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
 
x: ident
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q1)
H0: ‚¶É P2 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q2 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
x: ident
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q1)
H0: P2 -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q2)
‚¶É P1 \\// P2 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ

  
x: ident
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q1)
H0: P2 -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q2)
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q1 \\// Q2 ‚¶Ñ
x: ident
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q1)
H0: P2 -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q2)
P1 \\// P2 -->> ?P
 
x: ident
P1, P2, Q1, Q2: assertion
H: P1 -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q1)
H0: P2 -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q2)
P1 \\// P2 -->>
aforall
  (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) (Q1 \\// Q2))

  unfold aupdate, aforall in *; Tauto. 
Qed.

Definition choice_axiom :=
  forall (A B: Type) (R: A -> B -> Prop),
  (forall a, exists b, R a b) ->
  exists f: A -> B, forall a, R a (f a).


choice_axiom ->
forall (X : Type) (c : com) (P Q : X -> assertion),
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ


choice_axiom ->
forall (X : Type) (c : com) (P Q : X -> assertion),
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ

  
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
forall (c : com) (P Q : X -> assertion),
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
x: ident
a: aexp
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
b: bexp
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
x: ident
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ


CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
H': forall x : X, P x -->> Q x
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ

  
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
H': forall x : X, P x -->> Q x
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
H': forall x : X, P x -->> Q x
aexists P -->> ?P
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
H': forall x : X, P x -->> Q x
aexists P -->> aexists Q
 
  
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
H': forall x : X, P x -->> Q x
s: store
x: X
Px: P x s
aexists Q s
 exists x; apply H'; auto.

CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
x: ident
a: aexp
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
x: ident
a: aexp
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
forall y : X, P y -->> aupdate x a (Q y)
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
x: ident
a: aexp
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
H': forall y : X, P y -->> aupdate x a (Q y)
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ

  
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
x: ident
a: aexp
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
forall y : X, P y -->> aupdate x a (Q y)
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
x: ident
a: aexp
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
y: X
P y -->> aupdate x a (Q y)
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
x: ident
a: aexp
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
y: X
‚¶É P y ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q y ‚¶Ñ
 auto. 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
x: ident
a: aexp
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
H': forall y : X, P y -->> aupdate x a (Q y)
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ

  
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
x: ident
a: aexp
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
H': forall y : X, P y -->> aupdate x a (Q y)
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
x: ident
a: aexp
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
H': forall y : X, P y -->> aupdate x a (Q y)
aexists P -->> ?P
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
x: ident
a: aexp
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
H': forall y : X, P y -->> aupdate x a (Q y)
aexists P -->> aupdate x a (aexists Q)

  
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
x: ident
a: aexp
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
H': forall y : X, P y -->> aupdate x a (Q y)
s: store
y: X
Py: P y s
aupdate x a (aexists Q) s
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
x: ident
a: aexp
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
H': forall y : X, P y -->> aupdate x a (Q y)
s: store
y: X
Py: P y s
Q y (update x (aeval a s) s)
 apply H'; auto.

CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
REL:= fun (x : X) (R : assertion) =>
(‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ (‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ): X -> assertion -> Prop
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ

  
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
REL:= fun (x : X) (R : assertion) =>
(‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ (‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ): X -> assertion -> Prop
exists R : X -> assertion, forall x : X, REL x (R x)
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
c1, c2: com

(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ

IHc1: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
H1: ‚¶É aexists (fun x : X => atrue b //\\ P x) ‚¶Ñ c1
‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
x: X
‚¶É afalse b //\\ P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
x: X
H: ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
H1: ‚¶É aexists (fun x : X => atrue b //\\ P x) ‚¶Ñ c1
‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É afalse b //\\ P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ

IHc1: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
x: X
H: (‚¶É atrue b //\\ P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) /\
(‚¶É afalse b //\\ P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ)
H1: ‚¶É aexists (fun x : X => atrue b //\\ P x) ‚¶Ñ c1
‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É afalse b //\\ P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ

IHc1: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->

IHc2: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ

H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
H1: ‚¶É aexists (fun x : X => atrue b //\\ P x) ‚¶Ñ c1

H2: ‚¶É aexists (fun x : X => afalse b //\\ P x) ‚¶Ñ c2
‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ

(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
H1: ‚¶É aexists (fun x : X => atrue b //\\ P x) ‚¶Ñ c1
‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
H2: ‚¶É aexists (fun x : X => afalse b //\\ P x) ‚¶Ñ c2
‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
atrue b //\\ aexists P -->>
aexists (fun x : X => atrue b //\\ P x)

CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
REL:= fun (x : X) (Inv : assertion) =>
(‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
(P x -->> Inv) /\ (afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q x): X -> assertion -> Prop
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ

(P x -->> Inv) /\ (afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q x): X -> assertion -> Prop

  forall x : X, REL x (Inv x)

IHc: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ

REL:= fun (x : X) (Inv : assertion) =>
(‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
(P x -->> Inv) /\ (afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q x): X -> assertion -> Prop
Inv: X -> assertion
H': forall x : X, REL x (Inv x)
afalse b //\\ aexists Inv -->> aexists Q

  
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
REL:= fun (x : X) (Inv : assertion) =>
(‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
(P x -->> Inv) /\ (afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q x): X -> assertion -> Prop
Inv: X -> assertion
H': forall x : X, REL x (Inv x)
forall x : X, ‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv x ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv x ‚¶Ñ

REL:= fun (x : X) (R : assertion) =>
(P x -->> atrue b //\\ R) /\
(atrue b //\\ R -->> Q x): X -> assertion -> Prop
R: X -> assertion
A: forall x : X, REL x (R x)
atrue b //\\ aexists R -->> aexists Q

  
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
b: bexp
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
REL:= fun (x : X) (R : assertion) =>
(P x -->> atrue b //\\ R) /\
(atrue b //\\ R -->> Q x): X -> assertion -> Prop
R: X -> assertion
A: forall x : X, REL x (R x)
s: store
Bs: atrue b s
x: X
Rx: R x s
aexists Q s
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
b: bexp
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
REL:= fun (x : X) (R : assertion) =>
(P x -->> atrue b //\\ R) /\
(atrue b //\\ R -->> Q x): X -> assertion -> Prop
R: X -> assertion
A: forall x : X, REL x (R x)
s: store
Bs: atrue b s
x: X
Rx: R x s
B: P x -->> atrue b //\\ R x
C: atrue b //\\ R x -->> Q x
aexists Q s

Q x s
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
b: bexp
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
REL:= fun (x : X) (R : assertion) =>
(P x -->> atrue b //\\ R) /\
(atrue b //\\ R -->> Q x): X -> assertion -> Prop
R: X -> assertion
A: forall x : X, REL x (R x)
s: store
Bs: atrue b s
x: X
Rx: R x s
B: P x -->> atrue b //\\ R x
C: atrue b //\\ R x -->> Q x
(atrue b //\\ R x) s
 split; auto.

CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
x: ident
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É aexists P ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É aexists Q ‚¶Ñ
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
x: ident
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
forall y : X,
P y -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) (Q y))

CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
x: ident
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
H': forall y : X,
P y -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) (Q y))
aexists P -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) (aexists Q))

  
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
x: ident
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
H': forall y : X,
P y -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) (Q y))
s: store
y: X
Py: P y s
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) (aexists Q))
  s
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
x: ident
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
H': forall y : X,
P y -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) (Q y))
s: store
y: X
Py: P y s
a: Z
Q y (update x (aeval (CONST a) s) s)
 apply H'; auto.
Qed.


choice_axiom ->
forall X : Type,
X ->
forall (c : com) (P Q : X -> assertion),
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ


choice_axiom ->
forall X : Type,
X ->
forall (c : com) (P Q : X -> assertion),
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ

  
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
x: ident
a: aexp
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ

‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ

‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ

‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ

‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
REL:= fun (x : X) (R : assertion) =>
(‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ (‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ): X -> assertion -> Prop
H': exists R : X -> assertion,
  forall x : X, REL x (R x)
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ

  
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ

‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ

(‚¶É afalse b //\\ P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ)
H1: ‚¶É aforall (fun x : X => atrue b //\\ P x) ‚¶Ñ c1
‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É afalse b //\\ P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ

CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
H1: ‚¶É aforall (fun x : X => atrue b //\\ P x) ‚¶Ñ c1
‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
H2: ‚¶É aforall (fun x : X => afalse b //\\ P x) ‚¶Ñ c2
‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ

  
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
H1: ‚¶É aforall (fun x : X => atrue b //\\ P x) ‚¶Ñ c1
‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
H2: ‚¶É aforall (fun x : X => afalse b //\\ P x) ‚¶Ñ c2
‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
atrue b //\\ aforall P -->>
aforall (fun x : X => atrue b //\\ P x)
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
H1: ‚¶É aforall (fun x : X => atrue b //\\ P x) ‚¶Ñ c1
‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
H2: ‚¶É aforall (fun x : X => afalse b //\\ P x) ‚¶Ñ c2
‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
afalse b //\\ aforall P -->>
aforall (fun x : X => afalse b //\\ P x)

  
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
H1: ‚¶É aforall (fun x : X => atrue b //\\ P x) ‚¶Ñ c1
‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
H2: ‚¶É aforall (fun x : X => afalse b //\\ P x) ‚¶Ñ c2
‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
s: store
A: atrue b s
B: aforall P s
x: X
(atrue b //\\ P x) s

inhabited: X
b: bexp
c1, c2: com

(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->

(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ

H1: ‚¶É aforall (fun x : X => atrue b //\\ P x) ‚¶Ñ c1
‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
H2: ‚¶É aforall (fun x : X => afalse b //\\ P x) ‚¶Ñ c2
‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
s: store
A: afalse b s
B: aforall P s
x: X
(afalse b //\\ P x) s
 split; auto.

CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
REL:= fun (x : X) (Inv : assertion) =>
(‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
(P x -->> Inv) /\ (afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q x): X -> assertion -> Prop
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ

  
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
REL:= fun (x : X) (Inv : assertion) =>
(‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
(P x -->> Inv) /\ (afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q x): X -> assertion -> Prop
exists Inv : X -> assertion,
  forall x : X, REL x (Inv x)

IHc: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
REL:= fun (x : X) (Inv : assertion) =>
(‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
(P x -->> Inv) /\ (afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q x): X -> assertion -> Prop
Inv: X -> assertion
H': forall x : X, REL x (Inv x)
atrue b //\\ aforall Inv -->>
aforall (fun x : X => atrue b //\\ Inv x)
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P Q : X -> assertion,
(forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ) ->
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ

REL:= fun (x : X) (Inv : assertion) =>
(‚¶É atrue b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ) /\
(P x -->> Inv) /\ (afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q x): X -> assertion -> Prop
Inv: X -> assertion
H': forall x : X, REL x (Inv x)
aforall P -->> aforall Inv

CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
b: bexp
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
REL:= fun (x : X) (R : assertion) =>
(P x -->> atrue b //\\ R) /\
(atrue b //\\ R -->> Q x): X -> assertion -> Prop
R: X -> assertion
A: forall x : X, REL x (R x)
s: store
Bs: atrue b s
Rall: aforall R s
x: X
Q x s
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
b: bexp
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x : X, ‚¶É P x ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q x ‚¶Ñ
REL:= fun (x : X) (R : assertion) =>
(P x -->> atrue b //\\ R) /\
(atrue b //\\ R -->> Q x): X -> assertion -> Prop
R: X -> assertion
A: forall x : X, REL x (R x)
s: store
Bs: atrue b s
Rall: aforall R s
x: X
B: P x -->> atrue b //\\ R x
C: atrue b //\\ R x -->> Q x
Q x s
 apply C; split; auto.

CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
x: ident
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
x: ident
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
forall y : X,
P y -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) (Q y))
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
x: ident
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
H': forall y : X,
P y -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) (Q y))
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ

  
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
x: ident
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
forall y : X,
P y -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) (Q y))
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
x: ident
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
y: X
P y -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) (Q y))
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
x: ident
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
y: X
‚¶É P y ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q y ‚¶Ñ
 auto. 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
x: ident
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
H': forall y : X,
P y -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) (Q y))
‚¶É aforall P ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ

  
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
x: ident
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
H': forall y : X,
P y -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) (Q y))
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É aforall Q ‚¶Ñ
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
x: ident
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
H': forall y : X,
P y -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) (Q y))
aforall P -->> ?P
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
x: ident
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
H': forall y : X,
P y -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) (Q y))
aforall P -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) (aforall Q))

  
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
x: ident
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
H': forall y : X,
P y -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) (Q y))
s: store
Pall: aforall P s
n: Z
y: X
Q y (update x (aeval (CONST n) s) s)
 
CHOICE: choice_axiom
X: Type
inhabited: X
x: ident
P, Q: X -> assertion
H: forall x0 : X, ‚¶É P x0 ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q x0 ‚¶Ñ
H': forall y : X,
P y -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) (Q y))
s: store
Pall: aforall P s
n: Z
y: X
P y s
 auto.
Qed.

2.4. Soundness

Soundness of Hoare logic, in the style of type soundness proofs.

Module Soundness1.


forall (P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ -> forall s : store, P s -> ~ error c s


forall (P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ -> forall s : store, P s -> ~ error c s

  
P: assertion
b: bexp
s: store
Ps: (atrue b //\\ P) s
beval b s <> false
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
s: store
H: atrue b s
H0: P s
beval b s <> false
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
s: store
H: beval b s = true
H0: P s
beval b s <> false
 congruence.
Qed.


forall (P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
P s ->
red (c, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'


forall (P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
P s ->
red (c, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'

  
P: assertion
s: store
c': com
s': store
Ps: P s
RED: red (SKIP, s) (c', s')
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
c': com
s': store
Ps: aupdate x a P s
RED: red (ASSIGN x a, s) (c', s')
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
P, Q, R: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
P s ->
red (c1, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
IHHoare2: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
Q s ->
red (c2, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s: store
c': com
s': store
Ps: P s
RED: red (c1;; c2, s) (c', s')
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
(atrue b //\\ P) s ->
red (c1, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
IHHoare2: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
(afalse b //\\ P) s ->
red (c2, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s: store
c': com
s': store
Ps: P s
RED: red (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2, s) (c', s')
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
(atrue b //\\ P) s ->
red (c, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s: store
c': com
s': store
Ps: P s
RED: red (WHILE b c, s) (c', s')
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
c': com
s': store
Ps: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
RED: red (HAVOC x, s) (c', s')
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
P: assertion
b: bexp
s: store
c': com
s': store
Ps: (atrue b //\\ P) s
RED: red (ASSERT b, s) (c', s')
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
P s ->
red (c, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s: store
c': com
s': store
Ps: P' s
RED: red (c, s) (c', s')
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'


P: assertion
s: store
c': com
s': store
Ps: P s
RED: red (SKIP, s) (c', s')
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
 inv RED.

P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
c': com
s': store
Ps: aupdate x a P s
RED: red (ASSIGN x a, s) (c', s')
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
 
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
Ps: aupdate x a P s
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' (update x (aeval a s) s)

  
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
Ps: aupdate x a P s
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
Ps: aupdate x a P s
P (update x (aeval a s) s)
 
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
Ps: aupdate x a P s
P (update x (aeval a s) s)
 exact Ps.

P, Q, R: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
P s ->
red (c1, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
IHHoare2: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
Q s ->
red (c2, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s: store
c': com
s': store
Ps: P s
RED: red (c1;; c2, s) (c', s')
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
 
P, Q, R: assertion
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
c': com
H0: ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
P s ->
red (SKIP, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
IHHoare2: forall (s : store) (c'0 : com) (s' : store),
Q s ->
red (c', s) (c'0, s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c'0 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s': store
Ps: P s'
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
P, Q, R: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
P s ->
red (c1, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
IHHoare2: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
Q s ->
red (c2, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s, s': store
Ps: P s
c3: com
H2: red (c1, s) (c3, s')
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c3;; c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'

  
P, Q, R: assertion
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
c': com
H0: ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
P s ->
red (SKIP, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
IHHoare2: forall (s : store) (c'0 : com) (s' : store),
Q s ->
red (c', s) (c'0, s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c'0 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s': store
Ps: P s'
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
 
P, Q, R: assertion
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
c': com
H0: ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
P s ->
red (SKIP, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
IHHoare2: forall (s : store) (c'0 : com) (s' : store),
Q s ->
red (c', s) (c'0, s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c'0 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s': store
Ps: P s'
‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ
P, Q, R: assertion
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
c': com
H0: ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
P s ->
red (SKIP, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
IHHoare2: forall (s : store) (c'0 : com) (s' : store),
Q s ->
red (c', s) (c'0, s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c'0 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s': store
Ps: P s'
Q s'
 
P, Q, R: assertion
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
c': com
H0: ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
P s ->
red (SKIP, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
IHHoare2: forall (s : store) (c'0 : com) (s' : store),
Q s ->
red (c', s) (c'0, s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c'0 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s': store
Ps: P s'
Q s'
 eapply Hoare_skip_inv; eauto.
  
P, Q, R: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
P s ->
red (c1, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
IHHoare2: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
Q s ->
red (c2, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s, s': store
Ps: P s
c3: com
H2: red (c1, s) (c3, s')
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c3;; c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
 
P, Q, R: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
P s ->
red (c1, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
IHHoare2: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
Q s ->
red (c2, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s, s': store
Ps: P s
c3: com
H2: red (c1, s) (c3, s')
P': assertion
HO': ‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Ps': P' s'
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c3;; c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'

    
P, Q, R: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
P s ->
red (c1, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
IHHoare2: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
Q s ->
red (c2, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s, s': store
Ps: P s
c3: com
H2: red (c1, s) (c3, s')
P': assertion
HO': ‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Ps': P' s'
‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c3;; c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ
 apply Hoare_seq with Q; auto.

P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
(atrue b //\\ P) s ->
red (c1, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
IHHoare2: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
(afalse b //\\ P) s ->
red (c2, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s: store
c': com
s': store
Ps: P s
RED: red (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2, s) (c', s')
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
 
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
(atrue b //\\ P) s ->
red (c1, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
IHHoare2: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
(afalse b //\\ P) s ->
red (c2, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s': store
Ps: P s'
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ (if beval b s' then c1 else c2) ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\
  P' s'

  
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
(atrue b //\\ P) s ->
red (c1, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
IHHoare2: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
(afalse b //\\ P) s ->
red (c2, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s': store
Ps: P s'
‚¶É if beval b s'
  then atrue b //\\ P
  else afalse b //\\ P
‚¶Ñ (if beval b s' then c1 else c2) ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
(atrue b //\\ P) s ->
red (c1, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
IHHoare2: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
(afalse b //\\ P) s ->
red (c2, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s': store
Ps: P s'
(if beval b s'
 then atrue b //\\ P
 else afalse b //\\ P) s'

  
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
(atrue b //\\ P) s ->
red (c1, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
IHHoare2: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
(afalse b //\\ P) s ->
red (c2, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s': store
Ps: P s'
(if beval b s'
 then atrue b //\\ P
 else afalse b //\\ P) s'

  
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
(atrue b //\\ P) s ->
red (c1, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
IHHoare2: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
(afalse b //\\ P) s ->
red (c2, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s': store
Ps: P s'
(if beval b s'
 then fun s : store => beval b s = true /\ P s
 else fun s : store => beval b s = false /\ P s) s'
 destruct (beval b s') eqn:B; auto.

P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
(atrue b //\\ P) s ->
red (c, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s: store
c': com
s': store

RED: red (WHILE b c, s) (c', s')
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'

s': store

    unfold aand, atrue; auto.

x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
c': com
s': store
Ps: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
RED: red (HAVOC x, s) (c', s')
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
Ps: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
n: Z
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' (update x n s)
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
Ps: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
n: Z
‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
Ps: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
n: Z
Q (update x n s)
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
Ps: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
n: Z
Q (update x n s)
 apply Ps.

P: assertion
b: bexp
s: store
c': com
s': store
Ps: (atrue b //\\ P) s
RED: red (ASSERT b, s) (c', s')
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
s: store
c': com
s': store
Ps1: atrue b s
Ps2: P s
RED: red (ASSERT b, s) (c', s')
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
s': store
Ps2: P s'
Ps1: atrue b s'
H0: beval b s' = true
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'

  
P: assertion
b: bexp
s': store
Ps2: P s'
Ps1: atrue b s'
H0: beval b s' = true
‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ
P: assertion
b: bexp
s': store
Ps2: P s'
Ps1: atrue b s'
H0: beval b s' = true
(atrue b //\\ P) s'
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
s': store
Ps2: P s'
Ps1: atrue b s'
H0: beval b s' = true
(atrue b //\\ P) s'
 split; auto.

P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
P s ->
red (c, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s: store
c': com
s': store
Ps: P' s
RED: red (c, s) (c', s')
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
 
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
P s ->
red (c, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s: store
c': com
s': store
Ps: P s
RED: red (c, s) (c', s')
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
 
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
P s ->
red (c, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s: store
c': com
s': store
Ps: P s
RED: red (c, s) (c', s')
R: assertion
HO: ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Rs': R s'
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'

  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: forall (s : store) (c' : com) (s' : store),
P s ->
red (c, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
s: store
c': com
s': store
Ps: P s
RED: red (c, s) (c', s')
R: assertion
HO: ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Rs': R s'
‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ
 apply Hoare_consequence_post with Q; auto.
Qed.


forall (P Q : assertion) (c : com) (s : store)
  (c' : com) (s' : store),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
P s ->
star red (c, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'


forall (P Q : assertion) (c : com) (s : store)
  (c' : com) (s' : store),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
P s ->
star red (c, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'

  
forall cs cs' : com * store,
star red cs cs' ->
forall P Q : assertion,
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ fst cs ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
P (snd cs) ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ fst cs' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' (snd cs')
REC: forall cs cs' : com * store,
star red cs cs' ->
forall P Q : assertion,
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ fst cs ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
P (snd cs) -> exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ fst cs' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' (snd cs')
forall (P Q : assertion) (c : com) (s : store)
  (c' : com) (s' : store),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
P s ->
star red (c, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'

  
forall cs cs' : com * store,
star red cs cs' ->
forall P Q : assertion,
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ fst cs ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
P (snd cs) ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ fst cs' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' (snd cs')
 
a: (com * store)%type
P, Q: assertion
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ fst a ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P (snd a)
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ fst a ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' (snd a)
a, b, c: (com * store)%type
H: red a b
H0: star red b c
IHstar: forall P Q : assertion,
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ fst b ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
P (snd b) ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ fst c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' (snd c)
P, Q: assertion
H1: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ fst a ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H2: P (snd a)
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ fst c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' (snd c)

  
a: (com * store)%type
P, Q: assertion
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ fst a ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P (snd a)
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ fst a ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' (snd a)
 exists P; auto.
  
a, b, c: (com * store)%type
H: red a b
H0: star red b c
IHstar: forall P Q : assertion,
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ fst b ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
P (snd b) ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ fst c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' (snd c)
P, Q: assertion
H1: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ fst a ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H2: P (snd a)
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ fst c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' (snd c)
 
c1: com
s1: store
c2: com
s2: store
c3: com
s3: store
H: red (c1, s1) (c2, s2)
H0: star red (c2, s2) (c3, s3)
IHstar: forall P Q : assertion,
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
P s2 ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s3
P, Q: assertion
H1: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H2: P s1
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s3

    
c1: com
s1: store
c2: com
s2: store
c3: com
s3: store
H: red (c1, s1) (c2, s2)
H0: star red (c2, s2) (c3, s3)
IHstar: forall P Q : assertion,
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
P s2 ->
exists P' : assertion,
  (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s3
P, Q: assertion
H1: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H2: P s1
R: assertion
HO: ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Rs2: R s2
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c3 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s3

    eapply IHstar; eauto.
  
REC: forall cs cs' : com * store,
star red cs cs' ->
forall P Q : assertion,
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ fst cs ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
P (snd cs) -> exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ fst cs' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' (snd cs')
forall (P Q : assertion) (c : com) (s : store)
  (c' : com) (s' : store),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
P s ->
star red (c, s) (c', s') ->
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'

  
REC: forall cs cs' : com * store,
star red cs cs' ->
forall P Q : assertion,
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ fst cs ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
P (snd cs) -> exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ fst cs' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' (snd cs')
P, Q: assertion
c: com
s: store
c': com
s': store
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P s
H1: star red (c, s) (c', s')
exists P' : assertion, (‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ) /\ P' s'
 eapply (REC (c, s) (c', s')); eauto.
Qed.


forall (P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion)
  (s : store),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
P s ->
~ goeswrong c s /\
(forall s' : store, terminates c s s' -> Q s')


forall (P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion)
  (s : store),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ ->
P s ->
~ goeswrong c s /\
(forall s' : store, terminates c s s' -> Q s')

  
P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
s: store
HO: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Ps: P s
~ goeswrong c s
P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
s: store
HO: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Ps: P s
forall s' : store, terminates c s s' -> Q s'


P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
s: store
HO: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Ps: P s
~ goeswrong c s
 
P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
s: store
HO: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Ps: P s
c': com
s': store
RED: star red (c, s) (c', s')
STUCK: error c' s'
False

  
P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
s: store
HO: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Ps: P s
c': com
s': store
RED: star red (c, s) (c', s')
STUCK: error c' s'
P': assertion
HO': ‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ c' ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Ps': P' s'
False

  eapply Hoare_safe; eauto. 

P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
s: store
HO: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Ps: P s
forall s' : store, terminates c s s' -> Q s'
 
P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
s: store
HO: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Ps: P s
s': store
c': com
RED: star red (c, s) (c', s')
TERM: terminated c'
Q s'
 
P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
s: store
HO: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Ps: P s
s': store
c': com
RED: star red (c, s) (c', s')
TERM: c' = SKIP
Q s'
 
P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
s: store
HO: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Ps: P s
s': store
RED: star red (c, s) (SKIP, s')
Q s'
  
  
P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
s: store
HO: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Ps: P s
s': store
RED: star red (c, s) (SKIP, s')
P': assertion
HO': ‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Ps': P' s'
Q s'

  eapply Hoare_skip_inv; eauto.
Qed.

End Soundness1.

Soundness of strong Hoare logic, using an inductive "safe" predicate.

Module Soundness2.

Inductive safe (Q: assertion): com -> store -> Prop :=
  | safe_now: forall c s,
      terminated c -> Q s ->
      safe Q c s
  | safe_step: forall c s,
      ~terminated c -> ~error c s ->
      (forall c' s', red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s') ->
      safe Q c s.

Definition Triple (P: assertion) (c: com) (Q: assertion) : Prop :=
  forall s, P s -> safe Q c s.

Notation "„Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ" := (Triple P c Q) (at level 90, c at next level).


forall P : assertion, „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ SKIP „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ


forall P : assertion, „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ SKIP „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ

  
P: assertion
s: store
PRE: P s
safe P SKIP s
 
P: assertion
s: store
PRE: P s
terminated SKIP
P: assertion
s: store
PRE: P s
P s
 
P: assertion
s: store
PRE: P s
P s
 auto.
Qed.


forall (P : assertion) (x : ident) (a : aexp),
„Äö„Äö aupdate x a P „Äõ„Äõ ASSIGN x a „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ


forall (P : assertion) (x : ident) (a : aexp),
„Äö„Äö aupdate x a P „Äõ„Äõ ASSIGN x a „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ

  
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
safe P (ASSIGN x a) s
 
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
~ terminated (ASSIGN x a)
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
~ error (ASSIGN x a) s
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (ASSIGN x a, s) (c', s') -> safe P c' s'


P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
~ terminated (ASSIGN x a)
 unfold terminated; congruence. 

P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
~ error (ASSIGN x a) s
 cbn; tauto.

P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (ASSIGN x a, s) (c', s') -> safe P c' s'
 
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
safe P SKIP (update x (aeval a s) s)
 
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
terminated SKIP
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
P (update x (aeval a s) s)
 
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
P (update x (aeval a s) s)
 exact PRE.
Qed.


forall (Q R : assertion) (c' : com),
(forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c' s) ->
forall (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c') s


forall (Q R : assertion) (c' : com),
(forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c' s) ->
forall (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c') s

  
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c2 s
forall (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c2) s
 
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c2 s
c: com
s: store
H: terminated c
H0: Q s
safe R (c;; c2) s
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c2 s
c: com
s: store
H: ~ terminated c
H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
H2: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe R (c';; c2) s'
safe R (c;; c2) s

c2: com

safe R (c;; c2) s
