Q, R: assertion
c': com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c' s
s': store
H0: ~ error SKIP s'
H1: forall (c' : com) (s'0 : store),
red (SKIP, s') (c', s'0) -> safe Q c' s'0
H2: forall (c'0 : com) (s'0 : store),
red (SKIP, s') (c'0, s'0) ->
safe R (c'0;; c') s'0
H: ~ terminated SKIP
safe R c' s'
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c2 s
c: com
s: store
H: ~ terminated c
H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
H2: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe R (c';; c2) s'
s': store
c3: com
H4: red (c, s) (c3, s')
safe R (c3;; c2) s'

    
Q, R: assertion
c': com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c' s
s': store
H0: ~ error SKIP s'
H1: forall (c' : com) (s'0 : store),
red (SKIP, s') (c', s'0) -> safe Q c' s'0
H2: forall (c'0 : com) (s'0 : store),
red (SKIP, s') (c'0, s'0) ->
safe R (c'0;; c') s'0
H: ~ terminated SKIP
safe R c' s'
 elim H; red; auto.
    
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c2 s
c: com
s: store
H: ~ terminated c
H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
H2: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe R (c';; c2) s'
s': store
c3: com
H4: red (c, s) (c3, s')
safe R (c3;; c2) s'
 apply H2; auto.
Qed.


forall (P Q R : assertion) (c1 c2 : com),
„Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c1 „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ ->
„Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ c2 „Äö„Äö R „Äõ„Äõ -> „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c1;; c2 „Äö„Äö R „Äõ„Äõ


forall (P Q R : assertion) (c1 c2 : com),
„Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c1 „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ ->
„Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ c2 „Äö„Äö R „Äõ„Äõ -> „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c1;; c2 „Äö„Äö R „Äõ„Äõ

  
P, Q, R: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c1 „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
H0: „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ c2 „Äö„Äö R „Äõ„Äõ
„Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c1;; c2 „Äö„Äö R „Äõ„Äõ
 
P, Q, R: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c1 „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
H0: „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ c2 „Äö„Äö R „Äõ„Äõ
s: store
PRE: P s
safe R (c1;; c2) s
 apply safe_seq with Q; auto.
Qed.


forall (P Q : assertion) (b : bexp) (c1 c2 : com),
„Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c1 „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ ->
„Äö„Äö afalse b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c2 „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ ->
„Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ


forall (P Q : assertion) (b : bexp) (c1 c2 : com),
„Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c1 „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ ->
„Äö„Äö afalse b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c2 „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ ->

s: store

safe Q (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2) s

forall (P : assertion) (variant : aexp) (b : bexp)
  (c : com),
(forall v : Z,
 „Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ aequal variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c
 „Äö„Äö alessthan variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ) ->
„Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ WHILE b c „Äö„Äö afalse b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ


forall (P : assertion) (variant : aexp) (b : bexp)
  (c : com),
(forall v : Z,
 „Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ aequal variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c
 „Äö„Äö alessthan variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ) ->
„Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ WHILE b c „Äö„Äö afalse b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ

  
P: assertion
variant: aexp
b: bexp
c: com
T: forall v : Z,
„Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ aequal variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c
„Äö„Äö alessthan variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ
„Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ WHILE b c „Äö„Äö afalse b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ

  
P: assertion
variant: aexp
b: bexp
c: com
T: forall v : Z,
„Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ aequal variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c
„Äö„Äö alessthan variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ
forall (v : Z) (s : store),
P s ->
aeval variant s = v ->
safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
P: assertion
variant: aexp
b: bexp
c: com
T: forall v : Z,
„Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ aequal variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c
„Äö„Äö alessthan variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ
REC: forall (v : Z) (s : store),
P s ->
aeval variant s = v ->
safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
„Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ WHILE b c „Äö„Äö afalse b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ

  
P: assertion
variant: aexp
b: bexp
c: com
T: forall v : Z,
„Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ aequal variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c
„Äö„Äö alessthan variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ
forall (v : Z) (s : store),
P s ->
aeval variant s = v ->
safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
 
P: assertion
variant: aexp
b: bexp
c: com
T: forall v : Z,
„Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ aequal variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c
„Äö„Äö alessthan variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ
v: Z
H: forall y : Z,
0 <= y < v ->
forall s : store,
P s ->
aeval variant s = y ->
safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
forall s : store,
P s ->
aeval variant s = v ->
safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s

    
P: assertion
variant: aexp
b: bexp
c: com
T: forall v : Z,
„Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ aequal variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c
„Äö„Äö alessthan variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ
v: Z
H: forall y : Z,
0 <= y < v ->
forall s : store,
P s ->
aeval variant s = y ->
safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
s: store
H0: P s
H1: aeval variant s = v
safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
 
P: assertion
variant: aexp
b: bexp
c: com
T: forall v : Z,
„Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ aequal variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c
„Äö„Äö alessthan variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ
v: Z
H: forall y : Z,
0 <= y < v ->
forall s : store,
P s ->
aeval variant s = y ->
safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
s: store
H0: P s
H1: aeval variant s = v
~ terminated (WHILE b c)
P: assertion
variant: aexp
b: bexp
c: com
T: forall v : Z,
„Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ aequal variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c
„Äö„Äö alessthan variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ
v: Z
H: forall y : Z,
0 <= y < v ->
forall s : store,
P s ->
aeval variant s = y ->
safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
s: store
H0: P s
H1: aeval variant s = v
~ error (WHILE b c) s
P: assertion
variant: aexp
b: bexp
c: com
T: forall v : Z,
„Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ aequal variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c
„Äö„Äö alessthan variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ
v: Z
H: forall y : Z,
0 <= y < v ->
forall s : store,
P s ->
aeval variant s = y ->
safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
s: store
H0: P s
H1: aeval variant s = v
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (WHILE b c, s) (c', s') ->
safe (afalse b //\\ P) c' s'

P: assertion
variant: aexp
b: bexp
c: com
T: forall v : Z,

„Äö„Äö alessthan variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ

P s ->
aeval variant s = v ->

„Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ WHILE b c „Äö„Äö afalse b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ

  
P: assertion
variant: aexp
b: bexp
c: com
T: forall v : Z,
„Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ aequal variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c
„Äö„Äö alessthan variant v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ
REC: forall (v : Z) (s : store),
P s ->
aeval variant s = v ->
safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
s: store
PRE: P s
safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
 apply REC with (aeval variant s); auto.
Qed.


forall (x : ident) (Q : assertion),
„Äö„Äö aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q)
„Äõ„Äõ HAVOC x „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ


forall (x : ident) (Q : assertion),
„Äö„Äö aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q)
„Äõ„Äõ HAVOC x „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ

  
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
safe Q (HAVOC x) s
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
~ terminated (HAVOC x)
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
~ error (HAVOC x) s
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (HAVOC x, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
~ error (HAVOC x) s
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (HAVOC x, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (HAVOC x, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'

  
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
n: Z
safe Q SKIP (update x n s)
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
n: Z
terminated SKIP
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
n: Z
Q (update x n s)
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
n: Z
Q (update x n s)
 apply PRE.
Qed.


forall (b : bexp) (P : assertion),
„Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ ASSERT b „Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ


forall (b : bexp) (P : assertion),
„Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ ASSERT b „Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ

  
b: bexp
P: assertion
„Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ ASSERT b „Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ
 
b: bexp
P: assertion
s: store
PRE1: atrue b s
PRE2: P s
safe (atrue b //\\ P) (ASSERT b) s
 
b: bexp
P: assertion
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
safe (atrue b //\\ P) (ASSERT b) s

  
b: bexp
P: assertion
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
~ terminated (ASSERT b)
b: bexp
P: assertion
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
~ error (ASSERT b) s
b: bexp
P: assertion
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (ASSERT b, s) (c', s') ->
safe (atrue b //\\ P) c' s'
 
b: bexp
P: assertion
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
~ error (ASSERT b) s
b: bexp
P: assertion
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (ASSERT b, s) (c', s') ->
safe (atrue b //\\ P) c' s'
 
b: bexp
P: assertion
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (ASSERT b, s) (c', s') ->
safe (atrue b //\\ P) c' s'

  
b: bexp
P: assertion
s': store
PRE2: P s'
PRE1, H0: beval b s' = true
safe (atrue b //\\ P) SKIP s'
 
b: bexp
P: assertion
s': store
PRE2: P s'
PRE1, H0: beval b s' = true

b: bexp
P: assertion
s': store

s': store

 split; auto.
Qed.


forall (P Q P' Q' : assertion) (c : com),
„Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ ->
P' -->> P -> Q -->> Q' -> „Äö„Äö P' „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q' „Äõ„Äõ


forall (P Q P' Q' : assertion) (c : com),
„Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ ->
P' -->> P -> Q -->> Q' -> „Äö„Äö P' „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q' „Äõ„Äõ

  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
„Äö„Äö P' „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q' „Äõ„Äõ

  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
forall (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q c s -> safe Q' c s
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
REC: forall (c : com) (s : store), safe Q c s -> safe Q' c s
„Äö„Äö P' „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q' „Äõ„Äõ

  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
forall (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q c s -> safe Q' c s
 
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
c0: com
s: store
H2: terminated c0
H3: Q s
safe Q' c0 s
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
c0: com
s: store
H2: ~ terminated c0
H3: ~ error c0 s
H4: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c0, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
H5: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c0, s) (c', s') -> safe Q' c' s'
safe Q' c0 s

  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
c0: com
s: store
H2: terminated c0
H3: Q s
safe Q' c0 s
 apply safe_now; auto.
  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
c0: com
s: store
H2: ~ terminated c0
H3: ~ error c0 s
H4: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c0, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
H5: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c0, s) (c', s') -> safe Q' c' s'
safe Q' c0 s
 apply safe_step; auto.
  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
REC: forall (c : com) (s : store), safe Q c s -> safe Q' c s
„Äö„Äö P' „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q' „Äõ„Äõ

  red; auto.
Qed.


forall (P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion),
„Äö P „Äõ c „Äö Q „Äõ -> „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ


forall (P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion),
„Äö P „Äõ c „Äö Q „Äõ -> „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ

  
P: assertion
„Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ SKIP „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
„Äö„Äö aupdate x a P „Äõ„Äõ ASSIGN x a „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ
P, Q, R: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: „Äö P „Äõ c1 „Äö Q „Äõ
H0: „Äö Q „Äõ c2 „Äö R „Äõ
IHHOARE1: „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c1 „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
IHHOARE2: „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ c2 „Äö„Äö R „Äõ„Äõ
„Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c1;; c2 „Äö„Äö R „Äõ„Äõ
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: „Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ c1 „Äö Q „Äõ
H0: „Äö afalse b //\\ P „Äõ c2 „Äö Q „Äõ
IHHOARE1: „Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c1 „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
IHHOARE2: „Äö„Äö afalse b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c2 „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
„Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
a: aexp
H: forall v : Z,
„Äö atrue b //\\ aequal a v //\\ P „Äõ c
„Äö alessthan a v //\\ P „Äõ
H0: forall v : Z,
„Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ aequal a v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c
„Äö„Äö alessthan a v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ
„Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ WHILE b c „Äö„Äö afalse b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ
x: ident
Q: assertion
„Äö„Äö aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q)
„Äõ„Äõ HAVOC x „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
P: assertion
b: bexp
„Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ ASSERT b „Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: „Äö P „Äõ c „Äö Q „Äõ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHOARE: „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
„Äö„Äö P' „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q' „Äõ„Äõ


P: assertion
„Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ SKIP „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ
 apply Triple_skip.

P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
„Äö„Äö aupdate x a P „Äõ„Äõ ASSIGN x a „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ
 apply Triple_assign.

P, Q, R: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: „Äö P „Äõ c1 „Äö Q „Äõ
H0: „Äö Q „Äõ c2 „Äö R „Äõ
IHHOARE1: „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c1 „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
IHHOARE2: „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ c2 „Äö„Äö R „Äõ„Äõ
„Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c1;; c2 „Äö„Äö R „Äõ„Äõ
 apply Triple_seq with Q; auto.

P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: „Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ c1 „Äö Q „Äõ
H0: „Äö afalse b //\\ P „Äõ c2 „Äö Q „Äõ
IHHOARE1: „Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c1 „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
IHHOARE2: „Äö„Äö afalse b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c2 „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
„Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
 apply Triple_ifthenelse; auto.

P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
a: aexp
H: forall v : Z,
„Äö atrue b //\\ aequal a v //\\ P „Äõ c
„Äö alessthan a v //\\ P „Äõ
H0: forall v : Z,
„Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ aequal a v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ c
„Äö„Äö alessthan a v //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ
„Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ WHILE b c „Äö„Äö afalse b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ
 apply Triple_while with a; auto.

x: ident
Q: assertion
„Äö„Äö aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q)
„Äõ„Äõ HAVOC x „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
 apply Triple_havoc; auto.

P: assertion
b: bexp
„Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ ASSERT b „Äö„Äö atrue b //\\ P „Äõ„Äõ
 apply Triple_assert; auto.

P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: „Äö P „Äõ c „Äö Q „Äõ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHOARE: „Äö„Äö P „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q „Äõ„Äõ
„Äö„Äö P' „Äõ„Äõ c „Äö„Äö Q' „Äõ„Äõ
 apply Triple_consequence with P Q; auto.
Qed.

End Soundness2.

Soundness of weak Hoare logic, using a coinductive "safe" predicate.

Module Soundness3.

CoInductive safe (Q: assertion): com -> store -> Prop :=
  | safe_now: forall c s,
      terminated c -> Q s ->
      safe Q c s
  | safe_step: forall c s,
      ~terminated c -> ~error c s ->
      (forall c' s', red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s') ->
      safe Q c s.


forall (Q : assertion) (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q c s -> terminated c -> Q s


forall (Q : assertion) (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q c s -> terminated c -> Q s

  
Q: assertion
c: com
s: store
H: safe Q c s
H0: terminated c
Q s
 
Q: assertion
c: com
s: store
H0, H1: terminated c
H2: Q s
Q s
Q: assertion
c: com
s: store
H0: terminated c
H1: ~ terminated c
H2: ~ error c s
H3: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
Q s
 
Q: assertion
c: com
s: store
H0: terminated c
H1: ~ terminated c
H2: ~ error c s
H3: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
Q s
 contradiction.
Qed.


forall (Q : assertion) (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q c s -> ~ terminated c -> ~ error c s


forall (Q : assertion) (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q c s -> ~ terminated c -> ~ error c s

  
Q: assertion
c: com
s: store
H: safe Q c s
H0: ~ terminated c
~ error c s
 
Q: assertion
c: com
s: store
H0: ~ terminated c
H1: terminated c
H2: Q s
~ error c s
Q: assertion
c: com
s: store
H0, H1: ~ terminated c
H2: ~ error c s
H3: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
~ error c s
 
Q: assertion
c: com
s: store
H0, H1: ~ terminated c
H2: ~ error c s
H3: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
~ error c s
 auto.
Qed.


forall (Q : assertion) (c : com) (s : store)
  (c' : com) (s' : store),
safe Q c s -> red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'


forall (Q : assertion) (c : com) (s : store)
  (c' : com) (s' : store),
safe Q c s -> red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'

  
Q: assertion
c: com
s: store
c': com
s': store
H: safe Q c s
H0: red (c, s) (c', s')
safe Q c' s'
 
Q: assertion
c: com
s: store
c': com
s': store
H0: red (c, s) (c', s')
H1: terminated c
H2: Q s
safe Q c' s'
Q: assertion
c: com
s: store
c': com
s': store
H0: red (c, s) (c', s')
H1: ~ terminated c
H2: ~ error c s
H3: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
safe Q c' s'
 
Q: assertion
c: com
s: store
c': com
s': store
H0: red (c, s) (c', s')
H1: ~ terminated c
H2: ~ error c s
H3: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
safe Q c' s'
 eauto.
Qed. 

Definition triple (P: assertion) (c: com) (Q: assertion) : Prop :=
  forall s, P s -> safe Q c s.

Notation "‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ" := (triple P c Q) (at level 90, c at next level).


forall P : assertion, ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ


forall P : assertion, ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
P: assertion
s: store
PRE: P s
safe P SKIP s
 
P: assertion
s: store
PRE: P s
terminated SKIP
P: assertion
s: store
PRE: P s
P s
 
P: assertion
s: store
PRE: P s
P s
 auto.
Qed.


forall (P : assertion) (x : ident) (a : aexp),
‚¶É‚¶É aupdate x a P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ


forall (P : assertion) (x : ident) (a : aexp),
‚¶É‚¶É aupdate x a P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
safe P (ASSIGN x a) s
 
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
~ terminated (ASSIGN x a)
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
~ error (ASSIGN x a) s
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (ASSIGN x a, s) (c', s') -> safe P c' s'


P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
~ terminated (ASSIGN x a)
 unfold terminated; congruence. 

P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
~ error (ASSIGN x a) s
 cbn; tauto.

P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (ASSIGN x a, s) (c', s') -> safe P c' s'
 
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
safe P SKIP (update x (aeval a s) s)
 
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
terminated SKIP
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
P (update x (aeval a s) s)
 
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
P (update x (aeval a s) s)
 exact PRE.
Qed.


forall (Q R : assertion) (c' : com),
(forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c' s) ->
forall (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c') s


forall (Q R : assertion) (c' : com),
(forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c' s) ->
forall (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c') s

  
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c2 s
forall (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c2) s

H0: Q s
safe R (c;; c2) s

c2: com

H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
safe R (c;; c2) s

  
Q, R: assertion

c2: com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c2 s
CHR: forall (c : com) (s : store), safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c2) s

H0: Q s
c': com

c0: com
s0: store

H3: s0 = s
H4: c2 = c'
H5: s = s'
safe R c' s'

c2: com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c2 s
CHR: forall (c : com) (s : store), safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c2) s
c: com
s: store
H: terminated c
H0: Q s
c': com
s': store
c1, c0: com
s1: store
c3: com
s2: store
H2: red (SKIP, s) (c3, s')
H1: c1 = SKIP
H3: c0 = c2
H4: s1 = s
H5: (c3;; c2) = c'
H6: s2 = s'
safe R (c3;; c2) s'

c2: com

CHR: forall (c : com) (s : store), safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c2) s

c': com
s': store
c0: com
s0: store

H4: c2 = c'
H5: s = s'
safe R c2 s'

c2: com

H0: Q s
c': com
s': store

H3: c0 = c2
H4: s1 = s

safe R (c3;; c2) s'
 
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c2 s
CHR: forall (c : com) (s : store), safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c2) s

c2: com

s: store

c': com

H6: s2 = s'
safe R (c3;; c2) s'

    inv H2.
  
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c2 s
CHR: forall (c : com) (s : store), safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c2) s
c: com
s: store

H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
safe R (c;; c2) s
 
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c2 s
CHR: forall (c : com) (s : store), safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c2) s
c: com
s: store

H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
~ terminated (c;; c2)
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c2 s
CHR: forall (c : com) (s : store), safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c2) s
c: com
s: store

H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
~ error (c;; c2) s
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c2 s
CHR: forall (c : com) (s : store), safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c2) s
c: com
s: store
H: ~ terminated c
H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c;; c2, s) (c', s') -> safe R c' s'
 
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c2 s
CHR: forall (c : com) (s : store), safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c2) s
c: com
s: store
H: ~ terminated c
H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
~ error (c;; c2) s
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c2 s
CHR: forall (c : com) (s : store), safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c2) s
c: com
s: store
H: ~ terminated c
H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c;; c2, s) (c', s') -> safe R c' s'
 
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c2 s
CHR: forall (c : com) (s : store), safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c2) s
c: com
s: store
H: ~ terminated c
H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c;; c2, s) (c', s') -> safe R c' s'

    
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c2 s
CHR: forall (c : com) (s : store), safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c2) s
c: com
s: store
H: ~ terminated c
H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
c': com
s': store
RED: red (c;; c2, s) (c', s')
c0: com
s0: store
H3: SKIP = c
H4: c0 = c2
H5: s0 = s
H6: c2 = c'
H7: s = s'
safe R c' s'
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c2 s
CHR: forall (c : com) (s : store), safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c2) s
c: com
s: store
H: ~ terminated c
H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
c': com
s': store
RED: red (c;; c2, s) (c', s')
c1, c0: com
s1: store
c3: com
s2: store
H3: red (c, s) (c3, s')
H2: c1 = c
H4: c0 = c2
H5: s1 = s
H6: (c3;; c2) = c'
H7: s2 = s'
safe R (c3;; c2) s'

    
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c2 s
CHR: forall (c : com) (s : store), safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c2) s
c: com
s: store
H: ~ terminated c
H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
c': com
s': store
RED: red (c;; c2, s) (c', s')
c0: com
s0: store
H3: SKIP = c
H4: c0 = c2
H5: s0 = s
H6: c2 = c'
H7: s = s'
safe R c' s'
 elim H; red; auto.
    
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c2 s
CHR: forall (c : com) (s : store), safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c2) s
c: com
s: store
H: ~ terminated c
H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
c': com
s': store
RED: red (c;; c2, s) (c', s')
c1, c0: com
s1: store
c3: com
s2: store
H3: red (c, s) (c3, s')
H2: c1 = c
H4: c0 = c2
H5: s1 = s
H6: (c3;; c2) = c'
H7: s2 = s'
safe R (c3;; c2) s'
 
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
QR: forall s : store, Q s -> safe R c2 s
CHR: forall (c : com) (s : store), safe Q c s -> safe R (c;; c2) s
c: com
s: store
H: ~ terminated c
H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
c': com
s': store
RED: red (c;; c2, s) (c', s')
c1, c0: com
s1: store
c3: com
s2: store
H3: red (c, s) (c3, s')
H2: c1 = c
H4: c0 = c2
H5: s1 = s
H6: (c3;; c2) = c'
H7: s2 = s'
safe Q c3 s'
 apply H1; auto.
Defined.


forall (P Q R : assertion) (c1 c2 : com),
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ


forall (P Q R : assertion) (c1 c2 : com),
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
P, Q, R: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
 
P, Q, R: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
s: store
PRE: P s
safe R (c1;; c2) s
 apply safe_seq with Q; auto.
Qed.


forall (P : assertion) (b : bexp) (c : com),
‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ


forall (P : assertion) (b : bexp) (c : com),
‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
forall s : store,
P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
REC: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
forall s : store,
P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
CHR: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
s: store
Ps: P s
safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
CHR: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
s: store
Ps: P s
~ terminated (WHILE b c)
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
CHR: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
s: store
Ps: P s
~ error (WHILE b c) s
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
CHR: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
s: store
Ps: P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (WHILE b c, s) (c', s') ->
safe (afalse b //\\ P) c' s'
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
CHR: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
s: store
Ps: P s
~ error (WHILE b c) s
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
CHR: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
s: store
Ps: P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (WHILE b c, s) (c', s') ->
safe (afalse b //\\ P) c' s'
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
CHR: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
s: store
Ps: P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (WHILE b c, s) (c', s') ->
safe (afalse b //\\ P) c' s'

    
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
CHR: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
s: store
Ps: P s
c': com
s': store
RED: red (WHILE b c, s) (c', s')
b0: bexp
c0: com
s0: store
H0: beval b s' = false
H: b0 = b
H1: c0 = c
H2: s0 = s
H3: SKIP = c'
H4: s = s'
safe (afalse b //\\ P) SKIP s'
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
CHR: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
s: store
Ps: P s
c': com
s': store
RED: red (WHILE b c, s) (c', s')
b0: bexp
c0: com
s0: store
H0: beval b s' = true
H: b0 = b
H1: c0 = c
H2: s0 = s
H3: (c;; WHILE b c) = c'
H4: s = s'
safe (afalse b //\\ P) (c;; WHILE b c) s'

  
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

terminated SKIP

b: bexp

T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s''
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
CHR: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s

H4: s = s'

 auto.
    
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
CHR: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
s: store
Ps: P s
c': com
s': store
RED: red (WHILE b c, s) (c', s')

P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
CHR: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
s: store
Ps: P s
c': com
s': store
RED: red (WHILE b c, s) (c', s')
b0: bexp
c0: com
s0: store
H0: beval b s' = true
H: b0 = b
H1: c0 = c
H2: s0 = s
H3: (c;; WHILE b c) = c'
H4: s = s'
(atrue b //\\ P) s'
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
CHR: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
s: store
Ps: P s
c': com
s': store
RED: red (WHILE b c, s) (c', s')
b0: bexp
c0: com
s0: store
H0: beval b s' = true
H: b0 = b
H1: c0 = c
H2: s0 = s
H3: (c;; WHILE b c) = c'
H4: s = s'
P s'
 congruence.
  
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
REC: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
REC: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
s: store
PRE: P s
safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
REC: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) (WHILE b c) s
s: store
PRE: P s
P s
 auto.
Qed.


forall (P Q : assertion) (b : bexp) (c1 c2 : com),
‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ


forall (P Q : assertion) (b : bexp) (c1 c2 : com),
‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
s: store
PRE: P s
safe Q (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2) s
 
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
s: store
PRE: P s
~ terminated (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2)
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
s: store
PRE: P s
~ error (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2) s
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
s: store
PRE: P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
 
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
s: store
PRE: P s
~ error (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2) s
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
s: store
PRE: P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
 
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
s: store
PRE: P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'

  
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
s': store
PRE: P s'
safe Q (if beval b s' then c1 else c2) s'

  
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
s': store
PRE: P s'
B: beval b s' = true
safe Q c1 s'
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
s': store
PRE: P s'
B: beval b s' = false
safe Q c2 s'


P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
s': store
PRE: P s'
B: beval b s' = true
safe Q c1 s'
 apply H; split; auto.

P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
s': store
PRE: P s'
B: beval b s' = false
safe Q c2 s'
 apply H0; split; auto.
Qed.


forall (x : ident) (Q : assertion),
‚¶É‚¶É aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q)
‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ


forall (x : ident) (Q : assertion),
‚¶É‚¶É aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q)
‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
safe Q (HAVOC x) s
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store

~ terminated (HAVOC x)
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
~ error (HAVOC x) s
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s

red (HAVOC x, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store

~ error (HAVOC x) s
x: ident

s: store

red (HAVOC x, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (HAVOC x, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'

  
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
n: Z
safe Q SKIP (update x n s)
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
n: Z
terminated SKIP
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
n: Z
Q (update x n s)
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
n: Z
Q (update x n s)
 apply PRE.
Qed.


forall (b : bexp) (P : assertion),
‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ


forall (b : bexp) (P : assertion),
‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
b: bexp
P: assertion
‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
P: assertion
s: store
PRE1: atrue b s
PRE2: P s
safe (atrue b //\\ P) (ASSERT b) s
 
b: bexp
P: assertion
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
safe (atrue b //\\ P) (ASSERT b) s

  
b: bexp
P: assertion
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
~ terminated (ASSERT b)
b: bexp
P: assertion
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
~ error (ASSERT b) s
b: bexp
P: assertion
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (ASSERT b, s) (c', s') ->
safe (atrue b //\\ P) c' s'

P: assertion
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
~ error (ASSERT b) s
b: bexp
P: assertion
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (ASSERT b, s) (c', s') ->
safe (atrue b //\\ P) c' s'
 
b: bexp
P: assertion
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (ASSERT b, s) (c', s') ->
safe (atrue b //\\ P) c' s'

  
b: bexp
P: assertion
s': store
PRE2: P s'
PRE1, H0: beval b s' = true
safe (atrue b //\\ P) SKIP s'
 
b: bexp
P: assertion
s': store
PRE2: P s'
PRE1, H0: beval b s' = true
terminated SKIP
b: bexp
P: assertion
s': store
PRE2: P s'
PRE1, H0: beval b s' = true
(atrue b //\\ P) s'
 
b: bexp
P: assertion
s': store
PRE2: P s'
PRE1, H0: beval b s' = true
(atrue b //\\ P) s'
 split; auto.
Qed.


forall (P Q P' Q' : assertion) (c : com),
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ->
P' -->> P -> Q -->> Q' -> ‚¶É‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ


forall (P Q P' Q' : assertion) (c : com),
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ->
P' -->> P -> Q -->> Q' -> ‚¶É‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
‚¶É‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
forall (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q c s -> safe Q' c s
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
REC: forall (c : com) (s : store), safe Q c s -> safe Q' c s
‚¶É‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
forall (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q c s -> safe Q' c s
 
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
CH: forall (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q c s -> safe Q' c s
forall (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q c s -> safe Q' c s
 
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
CH: forall (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q c s -> safe Q' c s
c0: com
s: store
H2: terminated c0
H3: Q s
safe Q' c0 s
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
CH: forall (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q c s -> safe Q' c s
c0: com
s: store
H2: ~ terminated c0
H3: ~ error c0 s
H4: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c0, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
safe Q' c0 s

  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
CH: forall (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q c s -> safe Q' c s
c0: com
s: store
H2: terminated c0
H3: Q s
safe Q' c0 s
 apply safe_now; auto.
  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
CH: forall (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q c s -> safe Q' c s
c0: com
s: store
H2: ~ terminated c0
H3: ~ error c0 s
H4: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c0, s) (c', s') -> safe Q c' s'
safe Q' c0 s
 apply safe_step; auto.
  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
REC: forall (c : com) (s : store), safe Q c s -> safe Q' c s
‚¶É‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  red; auto.
Qed.


forall (P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ


forall (P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
P: assertion
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
‚¶É‚¶É aupdate x a P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
P, Q, R: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare2: ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare2: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
x: ident
Q: assertion
‚¶É‚¶É aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q)
‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
P: assertion
b: bexp
‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ


P: assertion
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
 apply triple_skip.

P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
‚¶É‚¶É aupdate x a P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
 apply triple_assign.

P, Q, R: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare2: ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
 apply triple_seq with Q; auto.

P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare2: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
 apply triple_ifthenelse; auto.

P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
 apply triple_while; auto.

x: ident
Q: assertion
‚¶É‚¶É aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q)
‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
 apply triple_havoc; auto.

P: assertion
b: bexp
‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
 apply triple_assert; auto.

P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
 apply triple_consequence with P Q; auto.
Qed.

End Soundness3.

Soundness of weak Hoare logic, using a step-indexed "safe" predicate.

Module Soundness4.

Inductive safe (Q: assertion): nat -> com -> store -> Prop :=
  | safe_zero: forall c s,
      safe Q O c s
  | safe_now: forall n c s,
      terminated c -> Q s ->
      safe Q (S n) c s
  | safe_step: forall n c s,
      ~terminated c -> ~error c s ->
      (forall c' s', red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s') ->
      safe Q (S n) c s.

Definition triple (P: assertion) (c: com) (Q: assertion) : Prop :=
  forall n s, P s -> safe Q n c s.

Notation "‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ" := (triple P c Q) (at level 90, c at next level).
Properties of safe. 
forall (Q : assertion) (n : nat) (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q n c s ->
forall n' : nat, (n' <= n)%nat -> safe Q n' c s


forall (Q : assertion) (n : nat) (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q n c s ->
forall n' : nat, (n' <= n)%nat -> safe Q n' c s

  
Q: assertion
c: com
s: store
n': nat
H: (n' <= 0)%nat
safe Q n' c s
Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H: terminated c
H0: Q s
n': nat
H1: (n' <= S n)%nat
safe Q n' c s
Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H: ~ terminated c
H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'
H2: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') ->
forall n' : nat, (n' <= n)%nat -> safe Q n' c' s'
n': nat
H3: (n' <= S n)%nat
safe Q n' c s


Q: assertion
c: com
s: store
n': nat
H: (n' <= 0)%nat
safe Q n' c s
 
Q: assertion
c: com
s: store
n': nat
H: (n' <= 0)%nat
safe Q 0 c s
 constructor.

Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H: terminated c
H0: Q s
n': nat
H1: (n' <= S n)%nat
safe Q n' c s
 
Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H: terminated c
H0: Q s
H1: (0 <= S n)%nat
safe Q 0 c s
Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H: terminated c
H0: Q s
n': nat
H1: (S n' <= S n)%nat
safe Q (S n') c s
 
Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H: terminated c
H0: Q s
n': nat
H1: (S n' <= S n)%nat
safe Q (S n') c s
 apply safe_now; auto.

Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H: ~ terminated c
H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'
H2: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') ->
forall n' : nat, (n' <= n)%nat -> safe Q n' c' s'
n': nat
H3: (n' <= S n)%nat
safe Q n' c s
 
Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H: ~ terminated c
H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'
H2: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') ->
forall n' : nat, (n' <= n)%nat -> safe Q n' c' s'
H3: (0 <= S n)%nat
safe Q 0 c s
Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H: ~ terminated c
H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'
H2: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') ->
forall n' : nat, (n' <= n)%nat -> safe Q n' c' s'
n': nat
H3: (S n' <= S n)%nat
safe Q (S n') c s

n: nat
c: com
s: store
H: ~ terminated c
H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'
H2: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') ->
forall n' : nat, (n' <= n)%nat -> safe Q n' c' s'

H3: (S n' <= S n)%nat
safe Q (S n') c s
 
Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H: ~ terminated c
H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'
H2: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),

n': nat
H3: (S n' <= S n)%nat

red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n' c' s'
 
Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H: ~ terminated c
H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'
H2: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') ->
forall n' : nat, (n' <= n)%nat -> safe Q n' c' s'
n': nat
H3: (S n' <= S n)%nat
c': com
s': store
H4: red (c, s) (c', s')
safe Q n' c' s'
 
Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H: ~ terminated c
H0: ~ error c s
H1: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'
H2: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') ->
forall n' : nat, (n' <= n)%nat -> safe Q n' c' s'
n': nat
H3: (S n' <= S n)%nat
c': com
s': store
H4: red (c, s) (c', s')
(n' <= n)%nat
 lia.
Qed.


forall (Q : assertion) (n : nat) (c : com) (s : store),
terminated c -> Q s -> safe Q n c s


forall (Q : assertion) (n : nat) (c : com) (s : store),
terminated c -> Q s -> safe Q n c s

  
Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H: terminated c
H0: Q s
safe Q n c s
 
Q: assertion
c: com
s: store
H: terminated c
H0: Q s
safe Q 0 c s
Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H: terminated c
H0: Q s
safe Q (S n) c s
 
Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H: terminated c
H0: Q s
safe Q (S n) c s
 apply safe_now; auto.
Qed.


forall (Q : assertion) (n : nat) (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q (S n) c s -> terminated c -> Q s


forall (Q : assertion) (n : nat) (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q (S n) c s -> terminated c -> Q s

  
Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H: safe Q (S n) c s
H0: terminated c
Q s
 
Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H0, H2: terminated c
H3: Q s
Q s
Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H0: terminated c
H2: ~ terminated c
H3: ~ error c s
H4: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'
Q s
 
Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H0: terminated c
H2: ~ terminated c
H3: ~ error c s
H4: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'
Q s
 contradiction.
Qed.


forall (Q : assertion) (n : nat) (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q (S n) c s -> ~ error c s

safe Q (S n) c s -> ~ error c s

n: nat
c: com
s: store

~ error c s

H2: Q s
~ error c s

c: com
s: store
H1: ~ terminated c
H2: ~ error c s
H3: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'
~ error c s


Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H1: terminated c
H2: Q s
~ error c s
 
Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H1: terminated c
H2: Q s
~ error SKIP s
 cbn; auto.

Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
H1: ~ terminated c
H2: ~ error c s
H3: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'
~ error c s

Qed.


forall (Q : assertion) (n : nat) (c : com) (s : store)
  (c' : com) (s' : store),
safe Q (S n) c s ->
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'


forall (Q : assertion) (n : nat) (c : com) (s : store)
  (c' : com) (s' : store),
safe Q (S n) c s ->
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'

  
Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
c': com
s': store
H: safe Q (S n) c s
H0: red (c, s) (c', s')
safe Q n c' s'
 
Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
c': com
s': store
H0: red (c, s) (c', s')
H2: terminated c
H3: Q s
safe Q n c' s'
Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
c': com
s': store
H0: red (c, s) (c', s')
H2: ~ terminated c
H3: ~ error c s
H4: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'
safe Q n c' s'
 

Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
c': com
s': store
H0: red (c, s) (c', s')
H2: terminated c
H3: Q s
safe Q n c' s'
 rewrite H2 in H0; inv H0.

Q: assertion
n: nat
c: com
s: store
c': com
s': store
H0: red (c, s) (c', s')
H2: ~ terminated c
H3: ~ error c s
H4: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'
safe Q n c' s'
 eauto.
Qed.
Deduction rules. 
forall P : assertion, ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ


forall P : assertion, ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
P: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE: P s
safe P n SKIP s
 
P: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE: P s
terminated SKIP
P: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE: P s
P s
 
P: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE: P s
P s
 auto.
Qed.


forall (P : assertion) (x : ident) (a : aexp),
‚¶É‚¶É aupdate x a P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ


forall (P : assertion) (x : ident) (a : aexp),
‚¶É‚¶É aupdate x a P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
safe P n (ASSIGN x a) s
 
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
safe P 0 (ASSIGN x a) s
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
safe P (S n) (ASSIGN x a) s
 
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
safe P (S n) (ASSIGN x a) s
 
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
~ terminated (ASSIGN x a)
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
~ error (ASSIGN x a) s
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (ASSIGN x a, s) (c', s') -> safe P n c' s'


P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
~ terminated (ASSIGN x a)
 unfold terminated; congruence. 

P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
~ error (ASSIGN x a) s
 cbn; tauto.

P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (ASSIGN x a, s) (c', s') -> safe P n c' s'
 
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
safe P n SKIP (update x (aeval a s) s)
 
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aupdate x a P s
P (update x (aeval a s) s)
 exact PRE.
Qed.


forall (Q R : assertion) (c' : com) (n : nat),
(forall (n' : nat) (s : store),
 (n' < n)%nat -> Q s -> safe R n' c' s) ->
forall (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q n c s -> safe R n (c;; c') s


forall (Q R : assertion) (c' : com) (n : nat),
(forall (n' : nat) (s : store),
 (n' < n)%nat -> Q s -> safe R n' c' s) ->
forall (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q n c s -> safe R n (c;; c') s

  
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
forall n : nat,
(forall (n' : nat) (s : store),
 (n' < n)%nat -> Q s -> safe R n' c2 s) ->
forall (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q n c s -> safe R n (c;; c2) s
 
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
QR: forall (n' : nat) (s : store),
(n' < 0)%nat -> Q s -> safe R n' c2 s
c: com
s: store
SF: safe Q 0 c s
safe R 0 (c;; c2) s
Q, R: assertion
c2: com
n: nat
IHn: (forall (n' : nat) (s : store), (n' < n)%nat -> Q s -> safe R n' c2 s) ->
forall (c : com) (s : store), safe Q n c s -> safe R n (c;; c2) s
QR: forall (n' : nat) (s : store),
(n' < S n)%nat -> Q s -> safe R n' c2 s
c: com
s: store
SF: safe Q (S n) c s
safe R (S n) (c;; c2) s


Q, R: assertion
c2: com
QR: forall (n' : nat) (s : store),
(n' < 0)%nat -> Q s -> safe R n' c2 s
c: com
s: store
SF: safe Q 0 c s
safe R 0 (c;; c2) s
 constructor.

Q, R: assertion
c2: com
n: nat

      eapply safe_step_inv; eauto. 
Qed.


forall (P Q R : assertion) (c1 c2 : com),
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ


forall (P Q R : assertion) (c1 c2 : com),
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
P, Q, R: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
 
P, Q, R: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
s: store
PRE: P s
safe R n (c1;; c2) s
 apply safe_seq with Q; auto.
Qed.


forall (P : assertion) (b : bexp) (c : com),
‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ


forall (P : assertion) (b : bexp) (c : com),
‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
forall (n : nat) (s : store),
P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) n (WHILE b c) s
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
s: store
Ps: P s
safe (afalse b //\\ P) 0 (WHILE b c) s
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
IHn: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) n (WHILE b c) s
s: store
Ps: P s
safe (afalse b //\\ P) (S n) (WHILE b c) s
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
IHn: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) n (WHILE b c) s
s: store
Ps: P s
safe (afalse b //\\ P) (S n) (WHILE b c) s

  
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
IHn: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) n (WHILE b c) s
s: store
Ps: P s
~ terminated (WHILE b c)
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
IHn: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) n (WHILE b c) s
s: store
Ps: P s
~ error (WHILE b c) s
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
IHn: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) n (WHILE b c) s
s: store
Ps: P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (WHILE b c, s) (c', s') ->
safe (afalse b //\\ P) n c' s'
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
IHn: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) n (WHILE b c) s
s: store
Ps: P s
~ error (WHILE b c) s
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
IHn: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) n (WHILE b c) s
s: store
Ps: P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (WHILE b c, s) (c', s') ->
safe (afalse b //\\ P) n c' s'
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
IHn: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) n (WHILE b c) s
s: store
Ps: P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (WHILE b c, s) (c', s') ->
safe (afalse b //\\ P) n c' s'

  
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
IHn: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) n (WHILE b c) s
s': store
Ps: P s'
H0: beval b s' = false
safe (afalse b //\\ P) n SKIP s'
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
IHn: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) n (WHILE b c) s
s': store
Ps: P s'
H0: beval b s' = true
safe (afalse b //\\ P) n (c;; WHILE b c) s'
 

P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
IHn: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) n (WHILE b c) s
s': store
Ps: P s'
H0: beval b s' = false
safe (afalse b //\\ P) n SKIP s'
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
IHn: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) n (WHILE b c) s
s': store
Ps: P s'
H0: beval b s' = false
(afalse b //\\ P) s'
 split; auto.

P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
T: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
IHn: forall s : store, P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) n (WHILE b c) s
s': store
Ps: P s'
H0: beval b s' = true
safe (afalse b //\\ P) n (c;; WHILE b c) s'
 
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com

H0: beval b s' = true

P s -> safe (afalse b //\\ P) n' (WHILE b c) s

Ps: P s'

safe P n c s'

 split; auto.
Qed.


forall (P Q : assertion) (b : bexp) (c1 c2 : com),
‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ


forall (P Q : assertion) (b : bexp) (c1 c2 : com),
‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ->
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
s: store
PRE: P s
safe Q n (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2) s
 
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
s: store
PRE: P s
safe Q 0 (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2) s
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
s: store
PRE: P s
safe Q (S n) (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2) s
 
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
s: store
PRE: P s
safe Q (S n) (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2) s

  
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
s: store
PRE: P s
~ terminated (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2)
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
s: store
PRE: P s
~ error (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2) s
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
s: store
PRE: P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'
 
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
s: store
PRE: P s
~ error (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2) s
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
s: store
PRE: P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'
 
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
s: store
PRE: P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'

  
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
s': store
PRE: P s'
safe Q n (if beval b s' then c1 else c2) s'

  
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
s': store
PRE: P s'
B: beval b s' = true
safe Q n c1 s'
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
s': store
PRE: P s'
B: beval b s' = false
safe Q n c2 s'


P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
s': store
PRE: P s'
B: beval b s' = true
safe Q n c1 s'
 apply H; split; auto.

P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
n: nat
s': store
PRE: P s'
B: beval b s' = false
safe Q n c2 s'
 apply H0; split; auto.
Qed.


forall (x : ident) (Q : assertion),
‚¶É‚¶É aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q)
‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ


forall (x : ident) (Q : assertion),
‚¶É‚¶É aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q)
‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
x: ident
Q: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
safe Q n (HAVOC x) s
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
safe Q 0 (HAVOC x) s
x: ident
Q: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
safe Q (S n) (HAVOC x) s
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
safe Q (S n) (HAVOC x) s

  
x: ident
Q: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
~ terminated (HAVOC x)
x: ident
Q: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
~ error (HAVOC x) s
x: ident
Q: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (HAVOC x, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
~ error (HAVOC x) s
x: ident
Q: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (HAVOC x, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (HAVOC x, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'

  
x: ident
Q: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
n0: Z
safe Q n SKIP (update x n0 s)
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
n0: Z
terminated SKIP
x: ident
Q: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
n0: Z
Q (update x n0 s)
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE: aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q) s
n0: Z
Q (update x n0 s)
 apply PRE.
Qed.


forall (b : bexp) (P : assertion),
‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ


forall (b : bexp) (P : assertion),
‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
b: bexp
P: assertion
‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
P: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE1: atrue b s
PRE2: P s
safe (atrue b //\\ P) n (ASSERT b) s
 
b: bexp
P: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
safe (atrue b //\\ P) n (ASSERT b) s

  
b: bexp
P: assertion
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
safe (atrue b //\\ P) 0 (ASSERT b) s
b: bexp
P: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
safe (atrue b //\\ P) (S n) (ASSERT b) s
 
b: bexp
P: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
safe (atrue b //\\ P) (S n) (ASSERT b) s

  
b: bexp
P: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
~ terminated (ASSERT b)
b: bexp
P: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
~ error (ASSERT b) s
b: bexp
P: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (ASSERT b, s) (c', s') ->
safe (atrue b //\\ P) n c' s'
 
b: bexp
P: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
~ error (ASSERT b) s
b: bexp
P: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (ASSERT b, s) (c', s') ->
safe (atrue b //\\ P) n c' s'
 
b: bexp
P: assertion
n: nat
s: store
PRE1: beval b s = true
PRE2: P s
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (ASSERT b, s) (c', s') ->
safe (atrue b //\\ P) n c' s'

  
b: bexp
P: assertion
n: nat
s': store
PRE2: P s'
PRE1, H0: beval b s' = true
safe (atrue b //\\ P) n SKIP s'
 
b: bexp
P: assertion
n: nat
s': store
PRE2: P s'
PRE1, H0: beval b s' = true
terminated SKIP
b: bexp
P: assertion
n: nat
s': store
PRE2: P s'
PRE1, H0: beval b s' = true
(atrue b //\\ P) s'
 
b: bexp
P: assertion
n: nat
s': store
PRE2: P s'
PRE1, H0: beval b s' = true
(atrue b //\\ P) s'
 split; auto.
Qed.


forall (P Q P' Q' : assertion) (c : com),
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ->
P' -->> P -> Q -->> Q' -> ‚¶É‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ


forall (P Q P' Q' : assertion) (c : com),
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ->
P' -->> P -> Q -->> Q' -> ‚¶É‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
‚¶É‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
forall (n : nat) (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q n c s -> safe Q' n c s
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
REC: forall (n : nat) (c : com) (s : store), safe Q n c s -> safe Q' n c s
‚¶É‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
forall (n : nat) (c : com) (s : store),
safe Q n c s -> safe Q' n c s
 
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
c0: com
s: store
safe Q' 0 c0 s
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
n: nat
c0: com
s: store
H2: terminated c0
H3: Q s
safe Q' (S n) c0 s
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
n: nat
c0: com
s: store
H2: ~ terminated c0
H3: ~ error c0 s
H4: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c0, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'
H5: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c0, s) (c', s') -> safe Q' n c' s'
safe Q' (S n) c0 s

  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
c0: com
s: store
safe Q' 0 c0 s
 constructor.
  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
n: nat
c0: com
s: store
H2: terminated c0
H3: Q s
safe Q' (S n) c0 s
 apply safe_now; auto.
  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
n: nat
c0: com
s: store
H2: ~ terminated c0
H3: ~ error c0 s
H4: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c0, s) (c', s') -> safe Q n c' s'
H5: forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c0, s) (c', s') -> safe Q' n c' s'
safe Q' (S n) c0 s
 apply safe_step; auto.
  
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
REC: forall (n : nat) (c : com) (s : store), safe Q n c s -> safe Q' n c s
‚¶É‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  red; auto.
Qed.


forall (P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ


forall (P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion),
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ

  
P: assertion
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
‚¶É‚¶É aupdate x a P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
P, Q, R: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare2: ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare2: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
x: ident
Q: assertion
‚¶É‚¶É aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q)
‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
P: assertion
b: bexp
‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ


P: assertion
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
 apply triple_skip.

P: assertion
x: ident
a: aexp
‚¶É‚¶É aupdate x a P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
 apply triple_assign.

P, Q, R: assertion
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare2: ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É‚¶É R ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
 apply triple_seq with Q; auto.

P, Q: assertion
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: ‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare1: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare2: ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
 apply triple_ifthenelse; auto.

P: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
H: ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ
IHHoare: ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É‚¶É afalse b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
 apply triple_while; auto.

x: ident
Q: assertion
‚¶É‚¶É aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q)
‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
 apply triple_havoc; auto.

P: assertion
b: bexp
‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
 apply triple_assert; auto.

P, Q, P', Q': assertion
c: com
H: ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
H0: P' -->> P
H1: Q -->> Q'
IHHoare: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É‚¶É P' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q' ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
 apply triple_consequence with P Q; auto.
Qed.

End Soundness4.

2.5. Completeness

Module Completeness.

Import Soundness3.
A weakest (liberal) precondition, defined in terms of the operational semantics. 
Definition sem_wp (c: com) (Q: assertion) : assertion :=
  fun s => safe Q c s.


forall c : com, {terminated c} + {~ terminated c}


forall c : com, {terminated c} + {~ terminated c}

  
forall c : com, {c = SKIP} + {c <> SKIP}
 destruct c; (left; reflexivity) || (right; discriminate).
Qed.


forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
sem_wp (c1;; c2) Q s -> sem_wp c1 (sem_wp c2 Q) s


forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
sem_wp (c1;; c2) Q s -> sem_wp c1 (sem_wp c2 Q) s

  
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
safe (fun s : store => safe Q c2 s) c1 s

  
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
t: terminated c1
safe (fun s : store => safe Q c2 s) c1 s
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
n: ~ terminated c1
safe (fun s : store => safe Q c2 s) c1 s


CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
t: terminated c1
safe (fun s : store => safe Q c2 s) c1 s
 
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
t: terminated c1
terminated c1
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
t: terminated c1
safe Q c2 s
 
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
t: terminated c1
safe Q c2 s

  
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
t: terminated c1
safe Q ?c ?s
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
t: terminated c1
red (?c, ?s) (c2, s)
 
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
t: terminated c1
red (c1;; c2, s) (c2, s)
 
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
t: terminated c1
red (SKIP;; c2, s) (c2, s)
 constructor.

CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
n: ~ terminated c1
safe (fun s : store => safe Q c2 s) c1 s
 
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
n: ~ terminated c1
~ terminated c1
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
n: ~ terminated c1
~ error c1 s
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
n: ~ terminated c1
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c1, s) (c', s') ->
safe (fun s : store => safe Q c2 s) c' s'
 
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
n: ~ terminated c1
~ error c1 s
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
n: ~ terminated c1
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c1, s) (c', s') ->
safe (fun s : store => safe Q c2 s) c' s'

  
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
n: ~ terminated c1
~ error (c1;; c2) s
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
n: ~ terminated c1
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c1, s) (c', s') ->
safe (fun s : store => safe Q c2 s) c' s'
  
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
n: ~ terminated c1
~ terminated (c1;; c2)
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
n: ~ terminated c1
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c1, s) (c', s') ->
safe (fun s : store => safe Q c2 s) c' s'
 
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
n: ~ terminated c1
forall (c' : com) (s' : store),
red (c1, s) (c', s') ->
safe (fun s : store => safe Q c2 s) c' s'

  
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
n: ~ terminated c1
c': com
s': store
H: red (c1, s) (c', s')
safe (fun s : store => safe Q c2 s) c' s'
 
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
n: ~ terminated c1
c': com
s': store
H: red (c1, s) (c', s')
safe Q (c';; c2) s'
 
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
n: ~ terminated c1
c': com
s': store
H: red (c1, s) (c', s')
safe Q ?c ?s
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
n: ~ terminated c1
c': com
s': store
H: red (c1, s) (c', s')
red (?c, ?s) (c';; c2, s')
 
CH: forall (c1 c2 : com) (Q : assertion) (s : store),
safe Q (c1;; c2) s ->
safe (fun s0 : store => safe Q c2 s0) c1 s
c1, c2: com
Q: assertion
s: store
SAFE: safe Q (c1;; c2) s
n: ~ terminated c1
c': com
s': store
H: red (c1, s) (c', s')
red (c1;; c2, s) (c';; c2, s')
 constructor; auto.
Qed.
Show that the triple { sem_wp c Q } c { Q } is derivable using the rules of Hoare logic. 
forall (c : com) (Q : assertion),
‚¶É sem_wp c Q ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ


forall (c : com) (Q : assertion),
‚¶É sem_wp c Q ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ

  
Q: assertion
‚¶É sem_wp SKIP Q ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
x: ident
a: aexp
Q: assertion
‚¶É sem_wp (ASSIGN x a) Q ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
‚¶É sem_wp (c1;; c2) Q ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
‚¶É sem_wp (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2) Q ‚¶Ñ 
IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c Q ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
‚¶É sem_wp (WHILE b c) Q ‚¶Ñ WHILE b c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
Q: assertion
‚¶É sem_wp (ASSERT b) Q ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
x: ident
Q: assertion
‚¶É sem_wp (HAVOC x) Q ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ


Q: assertion
‚¶É sem_wp SKIP Q ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
 
Q: assertion
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
sem_wp SKIP Q -->> ?P
 
Q: assertion
sem_wp SKIP Q -->> Q

  
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp SKIP Q s
Q s
 
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp SKIP Q s
safe Q ?c s
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp SKIP Q s
terminated ?c
 
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp SKIP Q s
terminated SKIP
 red; auto.

x: ident
a: aexp
Q: assertion
‚¶É sem_wp (ASSIGN x a) Q ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
 
x: ident
a: aexp
Q: assertion
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
x: ident
a: aexp
Q: assertion
sem_wp (ASSIGN x a) Q -->> ?P
 
x: ident
a: aexp
Q: assertion
sem_wp (ASSIGN x a) Q -->> aupdate x a Q

  
x: ident
a: aexp
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp (ASSIGN x a) Q s
aupdate x a Q s
 
  
x: ident
a: aexp
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp (ASSIGN x a) Q s
safe Q SKIP (update x (aeval a s) s)
x: ident
a: aexp
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp (ASSIGN x a) Q s
W': safe Q SKIP (update x (aeval a s) s)
aupdate x a Q s

a: aexp
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp (ASSIGN x a) Q s
safe Q SKIP (update x (aeval a s) s)
 
x: ident
a: aexp
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp (ASSIGN x a) Q s
safe Q ?c ?s
x: ident
a: aexp
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp (ASSIGN x a) Q s
red (?c, ?s) (SKIP, update x (aeval a s) s)
 
x: ident
a: aexp
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp (ASSIGN x a) Q s
red (ASSIGN x a, s) (SKIP, update x (aeval a s) s)
 apply red_assign. 
x: ident
a: aexp
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp (ASSIGN x a) Q s
W': safe Q SKIP (update x (aeval a s) s)
aupdate x a Q s

s: store
