aupdate x a Q s
x: ident
a: aexp
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp (ASSIGN x a) Q s
W': safe Q SKIP (update x (aeval a s) s)
terminated SKIP
 
x: ident
a: aexp
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp (ASSIGN x a) Q s
W': safe Q SKIP (update x (aeval a s) s)
terminated SKIP
 red; auto.

c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
‚¶É sem_wp (c1;; c2) Q ‚¶Ñ c1;; c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
 
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
‚¶É sem_wp (c1;; c2) Q ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É sem_wp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ

  
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É sem_wp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
sem_wp (c1;; c2) Q -->> ?P
 
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
sem_wp (c1;; c2) Q -->> sem_wp c1 (sem_wp c2 Q)

  intros s; apply sem_wp_seq.

‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ

P2: sem_wp (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2) Q s
sem_wp (if beval b s then c1 else c2) Q s

c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ

P2: sem_wp (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2) Q s
(if beval b s then c1 else c2) = c1

P2: sem_wp (WHILE b c) Q s

P2: sem_wp (WHILE b c) Q s

b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c Q ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
s: store

P2: sem_wp (WHILE b c) Q s
red (?c, ?s) (c;; WHILE b c, s)
 
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c Q ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
s: store
P1: atrue b s
P2: sem_wp (WHILE b c) Q s
red (WHILE b c, s) (c;; WHILE b c, s)
 
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c Q ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
s: store
P1: atrue b s
P2: sem_wp (WHILE b c) Q s
beval b s = true
 exact P1.
  
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c Q ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
afalse b //\\ sem_wp (WHILE b c) Q -->> Q
 
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c Q ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
s: store
P1: afalse b s
P2: sem_wp (WHILE b c) Q s
Q s

    
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall Q : assertion, ‚¶É sem_wp c Q ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ

s: store
P1: afalse b s
P2: sem_wp (WHILE b c) Q s
safe Q ?c s
b: bexp

s: store

terminated ?c

s: store

P2: sem_wp (WHILE b c) Q s
safe Q ?c0 ?s
b: bexp

red (?c0, ?s) (?c, s)

beval b s = false
b: bexp

s: store

Q: assertion

P2: sem_wp (WHILE b c) Q s

 red; auto.

b: bexp
Q: assertion
‚¶É sem_wp (ASSERT b) Q ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
Q: assertion
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ ASSERT b ‚¶É ?Q ‚¶Ñ

Q: assertion
sem_wp (ASSERT b) Q -->> ?P
b: bexp
Q: assertion
?Q -->> Q
 
b: bexp

sem_wp (ASSERT b) Q -->> atrue b //\\ ?P
b: bexp
Q: assertion
atrue b //\\ ?P -->> Q

  
b: bexp
Q: assertion
sem_wp (ASSERT b) Q -->> atrue b //\\ ?P
 
b: bexp
Q: assertion
s: store

(atrue b //\\ ?P) s

~ error (ASSERT b) s
b: bexp

(atrue b //\\ ?P) s

~ error (ASSERT b) s

beval b s = true

beval b s = true

 exact FINAL.
  
b: bexp
Q: assertion
atrue b //\\ Q -->> Q
 intros s; unfold aand; tauto.

x: ident
Q: assertion
‚¶É sem_wp (HAVOC x) Q ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ HAVOC x ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
x: ident
Q: assertion
sem_wp (HAVOC x) Q -->> ?P
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
sem_wp (HAVOC x) Q -->>
aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q)

  
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp (HAVOC x) Q s
n: Z
aupdate x (CONST n) Q s
 
  
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp (HAVOC x) Q s
n: Z
safe Q SKIP (update x n s)
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp (HAVOC x) Q s
n: Z
W': safe Q SKIP (update x n s)
aupdate x (CONST n) Q s

  
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp (HAVOC x) Q s
n: Z
safe Q SKIP (update x n s)
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp (HAVOC x) Q s
n: Z
safe Q ?c ?s
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp (HAVOC x) Q s
n: Z
red (?c, ?s) (SKIP, update x n s)
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp (HAVOC x) Q s
n: Z
red (HAVOC x, s) (SKIP, update x n s)
 apply red_havoc. 
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp (HAVOC x) Q s
n: Z
W': safe Q SKIP (update x n s)
aupdate x (CONST n) Q s

  
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp (HAVOC x) Q s
n: Z
W': Q (update x n s)
aupdate x (CONST n) Q s
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store

n: Z

terminated SKIP
 
x: ident
Q: assertion
s: store
W: sem_wp (HAVOC x) Q s
n: Z
W': safe Q SKIP (update x n s)
terminated SKIP
 red; auto.
Qed.
Relative completeness follows. 
forall (P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion),
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ


forall (P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion),
‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ

  
P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
 
P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
‚¶É sem_wp c Q ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
P -->> sem_wp c Q
 
  
P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
P -->> sem_wp c Q

  
P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
H: ‚¶É‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ c ‚¶É‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ‚¶Ñ
s: store
P s -> sem_wp c Q s
 apply H.
Qed.

End Completeness.

2.6. Calculating weakest preconditions and verification conditions

Module WP.
Annotated commands. 
Inductive com: Type :=
  | SKIP                                     (**r do nothing *)
  | ASSIGN (x: ident) (a: aexp)              (**r assignment: [v := a] *)
  | SEQ (c1: com) (c2: com)                  (**r sequence: [c1; c2] *)
  | IFTHENELSE (b: bexp) (c1: com) (c2: com) (**r conditional: [if b then c1 else c2] *)
  | WHILE (Inv: assertion) (b: bexp) (c1: com) (**r loop: [while b do c1 done] *)
  | ASSERT (b: bexp)                         (**r assertion (error if false) *)
  | HAVOC (x: ident).                        (**r nondeterministic assignment *)

Fixpoint erase (c: com) :=
  match c with
  | SKIP => Hoare.SKIP
  | ASSIGN x a => Hoare.ASSIGN x a
  | SEQ c1 c2 => Hoare.SEQ (erase c1) (erase c2)
  | IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 => Hoare.IFTHENELSE b (erase c1) (erase c2)
  | WHILE Inv b c => Hoare.WHILE b (erase c)
  | ASSERT b => Hoare.ASSERT b
  | HAVOC x => Hoare.HAVOC x
  end.

Fixpoint wlp (c: com) (Q: assertion) : assertion :=
  match c with
  | SKIP => Q
  | ASSIGN x a => aupdate x a Q
  | SEQ c1 c2 => wlp c1 (wlp c2 Q)
  | IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 => (atrue b //\\ wlp c1 Q) \\// (afalse b //\\ wlp c2 Q)
  | WHILE Inv b c => Inv
  | ASSERT b => atrue b //\\ Q
  | HAVOC x => aforall (fun n => aupdate x (CONST n) Q)
  end.

Fixpoint vcond (c: com) (Q: assertion) : Prop :=
  match c with
  | SKIP | ASSIGN _ _ => True
  | SEQ c1 c2 => vcond c1 (wlp c2 Q) /\ vcond c2 Q
  | IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 => vcond c1 Q /\ vcond c2 Q
  | WHILE Inv b c =>
      vcond c Inv /\
      (atrue b //\\ Inv -->> wlp c Inv) /\
      (afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q)
  | ASSERT b => True
  | HAVOC x => True
  end.

Definition vcgen (P: assertion) (c: com) (Q: assertion) : Prop :=
  vcond c Q /\ (P -->> wlp c Q).


forall (c : com) (Q : assertion),
vcond c Q -> ‚¶É wlp c Q ‚¶Ñ erase c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ


forall (c : com) (Q : assertion),
vcond c Q -> ‚¶É wlp c Q ‚¶Ñ erase c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ

  
Q: assertion
VC: vcond SKIP Q
‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ Hoare.SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
x: ident
a: aexp
Q: assertion
VC: vcond (ASSIGN x a) Q
‚¶É aupdate x a Q ‚¶Ñ Hoare.ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c1 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c2 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
VC: vcond (SEQ c1 c2) Q
‚¶É wlp c1 (wlp c2 Q) ‚¶Ñ erase c1;; erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c1 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c2 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
VC: vcond (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2) Q
‚¶É (atrue b //\\ wlp c1 Q) \\//
  (afalse b //\\ wlp c2 Q)
‚¶Ñ Hoare.IFTHENELSE b (erase c1) (erase c2) ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Inv: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c Q -> ‚¶É wlp c Q ‚¶Ñ erase c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
VC: vcond (WHILE Inv b c) Q
‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ Hoare.WHILE b (erase c) ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
Q: assertion
VC: vcond (ASSERT b) Q
‚¶É atrue b //\\ Q ‚¶Ñ Hoare.ASSERT b ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
x: ident
Q: assertion
VC: vcond (HAVOC x) Q
‚¶É aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q)
‚¶Ñ Hoare.HAVOC x ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ


Q: assertion
VC: vcond SKIP Q
‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ Hoare.SKIP ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
 apply Hoare_skip.

x: ident
a: aexp
Q: assertion
VC: vcond (ASSIGN x a) Q
‚¶É aupdate x a Q ‚¶Ñ Hoare.ASSIGN x a ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
 apply Hoare_assign.

c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c1 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c2 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
VC: vcond (SEQ c1 c2) Q
‚¶É wlp c1 (wlp c2 Q) ‚¶Ñ erase c1;; erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
 
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c1 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c2 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond c1 (wlp c2 Q)
VC2: vcond c2 Q
‚¶É wlp c1 (wlp c2 Q) ‚¶Ñ erase c1;; erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
 
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c1 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c2 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond c1 (wlp c2 Q)
VC2: vcond c2 Q
‚¶É wlp c1 (wlp c2 Q) ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É ?Q ‚¶Ñ
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c1 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c2 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond c1 (wlp c2 Q)
VC2: vcond c2 Q
‚¶É ?Q ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
 
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c1 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c2 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond c1 (wlp c2 Q)
VC2: vcond c2 Q
‚¶É wlp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
 apply IHc2; auto.

b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c1 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c2 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
VC: vcond (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2) Q
‚¶É (atrue b //\\ wlp c1 Q) \\//
  (afalse b //\\ wlp c2 Q)
‚¶Ñ Hoare.IFTHENELSE b (erase c1) (erase c2) ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c1 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c2 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond c1 Q
VC2: vcond c2 Q
‚¶É (atrue b //\\ wlp c1 Q) \\//
  (afalse b //\\ wlp c2 Q)
‚¶Ñ Hoare.IFTHENELSE b (erase c1) (erase c2) ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ

  
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c1 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c2 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion

VC2: vcond c2 Q
atrue b //\\
(atrue b //\\ wlp c1 Q) \\// (afalse b //\\ wlp c2 Q) -->>
wlp c1 Q
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c1 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c2 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond c1 Q
VC2: vcond c2 Q
afalse b //\\
(atrue b //\\ wlp c1 Q) \\// (afalse b //\\ wlp c2 Q) -->>

b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c1 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c2 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond c1 Q
VC2: vcond c2 Q
atrue b //\\
(atrue b //\\ wlp c1 Q) \\// (afalse b //\\ wlp c2 Q) -->>
wlp c1 Q
 
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c1 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c2 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond c1 Q
VC2: vcond c2 Q
s: store
(atrue b //\\
 (atrue b //\\ wlp c1 Q) \\// (afalse b //\\ wlp c2 Q))
  s -> wlp c1 Q s
 
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c1 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c2 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond c1 Q
VC2: vcond c2 Q
s: store
beval b s = true /\
(beval b s = true /\ wlp c1 Q s \/
 beval b s = false /\ wlp c2 Q s) -> wlp c1 Q s
 intuition congruence.
  
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c1 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c2 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond c1 Q
VC2: vcond c2 Q
afalse b //\\
(atrue b //\\ wlp c1 Q) \\// (afalse b //\\ wlp c2 Q) -->>
wlp c2 Q
 
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c1 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c2 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond c1 Q
VC2: vcond c2 Q
s: store
(afalse b //\\
 (atrue b //\\ wlp c1 Q) \\// (afalse b //\\ wlp c2 Q))
  s -> wlp c2 Q s
 
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c1 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c1 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall Q : assertion,
vcond c2 Q -> ‚¶É wlp c2 Q ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond c1 Q
VC2: vcond c2 Q
s: store
beval b s = false /\
(beval b s = true /\ wlp c1 Q s \/
 beval b s = false /\ wlp c2 Q s) -> wlp c2 Q s
 intuition congruence.

Inv: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall Q : assertion, vcond c Q -> ‚¶É wlp c Q ‚¶Ñ erase c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
VC: vcond (WHILE Inv b c) Q
‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ Hoare.WHILE b (erase c) ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
 
Inv: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall Q : assertion, vcond c Q -> ‚¶É wlp c Q ‚¶Ñ erase c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond c Inv
VC2: atrue b //\\ Inv -->> wlp c Inv
VC3: afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q
‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ Hoare.WHILE b (erase c) ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ

  
Inv: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall Q : assertion, vcond c Q -> ‚¶É wlp c Q ‚¶Ñ erase c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond c Inv
VC2: atrue b //\\ Inv -->> wlp c Inv
VC3: afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q
‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ Hoare.WHILE b (erase c) ‚¶É ?Q ‚¶Ñ

Q: assertion
VC1: vcond c Inv
VC2: atrue b //\\ Inv -->> wlp c Inv
VC3: afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q
?Q -->> Q

Q: assertion
VC1: vcond c Inv
VC2: atrue b //\\ Inv -->> wlp c Inv
VC3: afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ erase c ‚¶É Inv ‚¶Ñ

atrue b //\\ Inv -->> ?P

afalse b //\\ Inv -->> Q

  exact VC3.

b: bexp
Q: assertion
VC: vcond (ASSERT b) Q
‚¶É atrue b //\\ Q ‚¶Ñ Hoare.ASSERT b ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ

‚¶É atrue b //\\ Q ‚¶Ñ Hoare.ASSERT b ‚¶É ?Q ‚¶Ñ

Q: assertion

?Q -->> Q
 
b: bexp
Q: assertion
VC: vcond (ASSERT b) Q
atrue b //\\ Q -->> Q

  intros s [P1 P2]; auto.

x: ident
Q: assertion
VC: vcond (HAVOC x) Q
‚¶É aforall (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) Q)
‚¶Ñ Hoare.HAVOC x ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
 apply Hoare_havoc.
Qed.


forall (P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion),
vcgen P c Q -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ


forall (P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion),
vcgen P c Q -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ

  
P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond c Q
VC2: P -->> wlp c Q
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
 
P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond c Q
VC2: P -->> wlp c Q
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ erase c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond c Q
VC2: P -->> wlp c Q
P -->> ?P
 
P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond c Q
VC2: P -->> wlp c Q
P -->> wlp c Q
 auto.
Qed.

End WP.

2.7. Calculating strongest postconditions and verification conditions

Module SP.

Import WP.  (**r for annotated commands *)

Fixpoint sp (P: assertion) (c: com) : assertion :=
  match c with
  | SKIP => P
  | ASSIGN x a => aexists (fun x0 => aexists (fun v => aequal (VAR x) v //\\ aupdate x (CONST x0) (P //\\ aequal a v)))
  | SEQ c1 c2 => sp (sp P c1) c2
  | IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 => sp (atrue b //\\ P) c1 \\// sp (afalse b //\\ P) c2
  | WHILE Inv b c => afalse b //\\ Inv
  | ASSERT b => atrue b //\\ P
  | HAVOC x => aexists (fun n => aupdate x (CONST n) P)
  end.

Fixpoint vcond (P: assertion) (c: com) : Prop :=
  match c with
  | SKIP | ASSIGN _ _ => True
  | SEQ c1 c2 => vcond P c1 /\ vcond (sp P c1) c2
  | IFTHENELSE b c1 c2 => vcond (atrue b //\\ P) c1 /\ vcond (afalse b //\\ P) c2
  | WHILE Inv b c =>
      vcond (atrue b //\\ Inv) c /\
      (P -->> Inv) /\
      (sp (atrue b //\\ Inv) c -->> Inv)
  | ASSERT b =>
      (P -->> atrue b)
  | HAVOC x => True
  end.

Definition vcgen (P: assertion) (c: com) (Q: assertion) : Prop :=
  vcond P c /\ (sp P c -->> Q).


forall (c : com) (P : assertion),
vcond P c -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c ‚¶É sp P c ‚¶Ñ


forall (c : com) (P : assertion),
vcond P c -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c ‚¶É sp P c ‚¶Ñ

  
P: assertion
VC: vcond P SKIP
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ Hoare.SKIP ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ
x: ident
a: aexp
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (ASSIGN x a)
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ Hoare.ASSIGN x a
‚¶É aexists
    (fun x0 : Z =>
     aexists
       (fun v : Z =>
        aequal (VAR x) v //\\
        aupdate x (CONST x0) (P //\\ aequal a v))) ‚¶Ñ
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P : assertion,
vcond P c1 -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É sp P c1 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P : assertion,
vcond P c2 -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É sp P c2 ‚¶Ñ
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (SEQ c1 c2)
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c1;; erase c2 ‚¶É sp (sp P c1) c2 ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P : assertion,
vcond P c1 -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É sp P c1 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P : assertion,
vcond P c2 -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É sp P c2 ‚¶Ñ
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2)
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ Hoare.IFTHENELSE b (erase c1) (erase c2)
‚¶É sp (atrue b //\\ P) c1 \\// sp (afalse b //\\ P) c2
‚¶Ñ
Inv: assertion
b: bexp
c: com
IHc: forall P : assertion,
vcond P c -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c ‚¶É sp P c ‚¶Ñ
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (WHILE Inv b c)
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ Hoare.WHILE b (erase c) ‚¶É afalse b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ
b: bexp
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (ASSERT b)
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ Hoare.ASSERT b ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ
x: ident
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (HAVOC x)
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ Hoare.HAVOC x
‚¶É aexists (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) P) ‚¶Ñ


P: assertion
VC: vcond P SKIP
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ Hoare.SKIP ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ
 apply Hoare_skip.

x: ident
a: aexp
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (ASSIGN x a)
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ Hoare.ASSIGN x a
‚¶É aexists
    (fun x0 : Z =>
     aexists
       (fun v : Z =>
        aequal (VAR x) v //\\
        aupdate x (CONST x0) (P //\\ aequal a v))) ‚¶Ñ
 apply Floyd_assign.

c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P : assertion,
vcond P c1 -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É sp P c1 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P : assertion,
vcond P c2 -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É sp P c2 ‚¶Ñ

VC: vcond P (SEQ c1 c2)
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c1;; erase c2 ‚¶É sp (sp P c1) c2 ‚¶Ñ

vcond P c1 -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É sp P c1 ‚¶Ñ

vcond P c2 -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É sp P c2 ‚¶Ñ

VC1: vcond P c1
VC2: vcond (sp P c1) c2
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c1;; erase c2 ‚¶É sp (sp P c1) c2 ‚¶Ñ

vcond P c2 -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É sp P c2 ‚¶Ñ

VC1: vcond P c1
VC2: vcond (sp P c1) c2
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É ?Q ‚¶Ñ

‚¶É ?Q ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É sp (sp P c1) c2 ‚¶Ñ

vcond P c2 -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É sp P c2 ‚¶Ñ

VC2: vcond (sp P c1) c2
‚¶É sp P c1 ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É sp (sp P c1) c2 ‚¶Ñ
 apply IHc2; auto.

b: bexp
c1, c2: com

vcond P c1 -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É sp P c1 ‚¶Ñ

vcond P c2 -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É sp P c2 ‚¶Ñ

VC: vcond P (IFTHENELSE b c1 c2)
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ Hoare.IFTHENELSE b (erase c1) (erase c2)
‚¶É sp (atrue b //\\ P) c1 \\// sp (afalse b //\\ P) c2
‚¶Ñ
 
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P : assertion,
vcond P c1 -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É sp P c1 ‚¶Ñ

vcond P c2 -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É sp P c2 ‚¶Ñ

VC2: vcond (afalse b //\\ P) c2
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ Hoare.IFTHENELSE b (erase c1) (erase c2)
‚¶É sp (atrue b //\\ P) c1 \\// sp (afalse b //\\ P) c2
‚¶Ñ

  
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P : assertion,
vcond P c1 -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É sp P c1 ‚¶Ñ

b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P : assertion,
vcond P c1 -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É sp P c1 ‚¶Ñ
IHc2: forall P : assertion,
vcond P c2 -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c2 ‚¶É sp P c2 ‚¶Ñ

VC2: vcond (afalse b //\\ P) c2
s: store
sp (atrue b //\\ P) c1 s ->
(sp (atrue b //\\ P) c1 \\// sp (afalse b //\\ P) c2)
  s
 unfold aand, aor, atrue, afalse; tauto.
  
b: bexp
c1, c2: com
IHc1: forall P : assertion,
vcond P c1 -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c1 ‚¶É sp P c1 ‚¶Ñ

  s
 unfold aand, aor, atrue, afalse; tauto.

b: bexp

‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ Hoare.WHILE b (erase c) ‚¶É afalse b //\\ Inv ‚¶Ñ

VC2: P -->> Inv

 eexact VC3.

b: bexp
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (ASSERT b)
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ Hoare.ASSERT b ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ

‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ Hoare.ASSERT b ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ

‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ Hoare.ASSERT b ‚¶É atrue b //\\ P ‚¶Ñ

P -->> ?P
 
b: bexp
P: assertion
VC: P -->> atrue b
P -->> atrue b //\\ P

  
b: bexp
P: assertion
VC: P -->> atrue b
s: store
Ps: P s
(atrue b //\\ P) s
 split; auto.

x: ident
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (HAVOC x)
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ Hoare.HAVOC x
‚¶É aexists (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) P) ‚¶Ñ
 
x: ident
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (HAVOC x)
‚¶É ?P ‚¶Ñ Hoare.HAVOC x
‚¶É aexists (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) P) ‚¶Ñ
x: ident
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (HAVOC x)
P -->> ?P
 
x: ident
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (HAVOC x)
P -->>
aforall
  (fun n : Z =>
   aupdate x (CONST n)
     (aexists (fun n0 : Z => aupdate x (CONST n0) P)))

  
x: ident
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (HAVOC x)
s: store
Ps: P s
n: Z
aupdate x (CONST n)
  (aexists (fun n : Z => aupdate x (CONST n) P)) s
 
x: ident
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (HAVOC x)
s: store
Ps: P s
n: Z
aupdate x (CONST (s x)) P
  (update x (aeval (CONST n) s) s)
 
x: ident
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (HAVOC x)
s: store
Ps: P s
n: Z
aupdate x (CONST (s x)) P (update x n s)

  
x: ident
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (HAVOC x)
s: store
Ps: P s
n: Z
s':= update x n s: store
aupdate x (CONST (s x)) P s'

  
x: ident
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (HAVOC x)
s: store
Ps: P s
n: Z
s':= update x n s: store
s'':= update x (s x) s': store
aupdate x (CONST (s x)) P s'

  
x: ident
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (HAVOC x)
s: store
Ps: P s
n: Z
s':= update x n s: store
s'':= update x (s x) s': store
s'' = s
x: ident
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (HAVOC x)
s: store
Ps: P s
n: Z
s':= update x n s: store
s'':= update x (s x) s': store
H: s'' = s
aupdate x (CONST (s x)) P s'

  
x: ident
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (HAVOC x)
s: store
Ps: P s
n: Z
s':= update x n s: store
s'':= update x (s x) s': store
s'' = s
 
x: ident
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (HAVOC x)
s: store
Ps: P s
n: Z
s':= update x n s: store
s'':= update x (s x) s': store
y: ident
s'' y = s y

    
x: ident
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (HAVOC x)
s: store
Ps: P s
n: Z
s':= update x n s: store
s'':= update x (s x) s': store
y: ident
(if string_dec x y
 then s x
 else if string_dec x y then n else s y) = s y
 destruct (string_dec x y); congruence. 
x: ident
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (HAVOC x)
s: store
Ps: P s
n: Z
s':= update x n s: store
s'':= update x (s x) s': store
H: s'' = s
aupdate x (CONST (s x)) P s'

  
x: ident
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (HAVOC x)
s: store
Ps: P s
n: Z
s':= update x n s: store
s'':= update x (s x) s': store
H: s'' = s
P (update x (s x) s')
 
x: ident
P: assertion
VC: vcond P (HAVOC x)
s: store
Ps: P s
n: Z
s':= update x n s: store
s'':= update x (s x) s': store
H: s'' = s
P s''
 congruence.
Qed.


forall (P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion),
vcgen P c Q -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ


forall (P : assertion) (c : com) (Q : assertion),
vcgen P c Q -> ‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ

  
P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond P c
VC2: sp P c -->> Q
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c ‚¶É Q ‚¶Ñ
 
P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond P c
VC2: sp P c -->> Q
‚¶É P ‚¶Ñ erase c ‚¶É ?Q ‚¶Ñ
P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond P c
VC2: sp P c -->> Q
?Q -->> Q
 
P: assertion
c: com
Q: assertion
VC1: vcond P c
VC2: sp P c -->> Q
sp P c -->> Q
 auto.
Qed.

End SP.
